translation.en: -Hello? -Sonny, it's your dad. You asleep?
translation.it: - Pronto. - Sonny, sono tuo padre. Dormivi?

translation.en: No. Hey, man. I was exercising.
translation.it: No, ma che dici? Stavo facendo ginnastica.

translation.en: -Bullshit. You were sleeping. -I wasn't.
translation.it: - Boiate. Stavi dormendo. - Non è vero.

translation.en: This kid won't stop lying to me. You still act like you're 6.
translation.it: Bugie. Ti comporti come se avessi sei anni.

translation.en: Yeah, okay, Dad. I act like I'm 6.
translation.it: Va bene, papà. Mi comporto come se avessi sei anni.

translation.en: Found a job yet where you work more than one day a week?
translation.it: Stai lavorando per più di un giorno alla settimana?

translation.en: I've been looking.
Looking won't pay the rent.
All the money I won from the cab accident...
translation.it: I soldi dell'incidente con il taxi...

translation.en: ...is kicking ass in the stock market, so relax.
-Don't blow it on worthless crap. -I won't.
translation.it: - Non spenderli in stupidaggini. - No, va bene.

translation.en: You should spend it on your bar exam.
translation.it: Usali per l'esame da procuratore legale.

translation.en: You're the lawyer. I ain't taking a bar exam.
translation.it: Sei tu l'avvocato. Io non lo faccio l'esame.

translation.en: I got too much other shit going on.
translation.it: La mia vita è fin troppo piena.

translation.en: I don't know what happened to you.
translation.it: Non capisco cosa ti sia successo.

translation.en: How're things going with your girlfriend, Vanessa?
translation.it: Come vanno le cose con la tua ragazza, Vanessa?

translation.en: Things are going fine.
Shit!
I gotta go.
Shit! You turned off the alarm clock again.
translation.it: Merda! Hai spento di nuovo la sveglia.

translation.en: No! I mean, yes, I did, but I thought you needed more sleep.
translation.it: No! Cioè, sì. Ma credevo che ti servisse più riposo.

translation.en: I shouldn't have stayed here. That was a jerk thing to do.
translation.it: Non avrei dovuto fermarmi qui. Ho fatto una stronzata.

translation.en: Why are you going to work? It's Sunday.
translation.it: Perché vai a lavorare? È domenica.

translation.en: I'm not going to work. I'm going to brunch with potential clients.
translation.it: Non vado a lavorare. Vado a pranzo con dei potenziali clienti.

translation.en: That's how a party planner gets business, by making contacts.
translation.it: Un'organizzatrice di feste trova lavoro così, incontrando gente.

translation.en: Meet with me. I'll order in from Cozy's. We'll have fun.
translation.it: Incontra me. Ordino il pranzo da Cozy, ci divertiamo.

translation.en: I am sick of Cozy's. You order in from there all the time.
translation.it: Mi sono rotta di Cozy. Ordini sempre lì.

translation.en: The delivery guy's your best friend.
He happens to be pretty damn nice.
translation.it: Si dà il caso che sia molto simpatico.

translation.en: This is a rough patch in my life.
translation.it: È un periodo difficile per me.

translation.en: Syracuse is 0 and 3. And I got those medical problems.
translation.it: Syracuse è sotto di tre. E ho i soliti problemi di salute.

translation.en: Medical problems?
A cab runs over your foot two years ago. You're hospitalized one night.
translation.it: Un taxi ti arrota un piede due anni fa e passi una notte in ospedale.

translation.en: First of all, that cab was huge.
And a jury decided that one night of pain was worth $200,000.
translation.it: E una giuria ha deciso che una notte di dolore valeva $200.000.

translation.en: -So there you go. -Whatever.
translation.it: - E questo è quanto. - Come vuoi tu.

translation.en: Why are you being so nuts to me lately?
You refuse to move on to the next phase.
translation.it: Perché ti rifiuti di passare alla fase successiva.

translation.en: I'd like to have a family someday.
I need someone I can rely on, not a playmate.
translation.it: Voglio qualcuno su cui contare, non un compagno di giochi.

translation.en: You need a father figure? "Stop pulling your sister's hair!"
translation.it: Vuoi una figura paterna? "Non tirare i capelli a tua sorella!"

translation.en: You know what? I'm gonna go to Syracuse to see my mom.
translation.it: Sai cosa? Vado a Syracuse a trovare mia madre.

translation.en: -I'll be back on Wednesday. -What are you talking about?
I had call for delivery, but it was crank call. You want chocolate cake?
translation.it: Avevo una consegna ma era uno scherzo. Volete della torta al cioccolato?

translation.en: Come back later. I'll Indian wrestle you.
translation.it: Non ora. Torna dopo e ti stendo.

translation.en: You're going down, sucker.
We'll see about that.
Okay. Peace, out.
You're going to Syracuse?
I need time to think and so do you.
Think about what?
Your life and why I should be a part of it.
translation.it: Sulla tua vita e su perché io dovrei farne parte.

translation.en: -All right. -While you're at it...
...think about getting a real job.
I got a real job!
Patrick Ewing, nice shot.
-Hey, Sonny. -What's up, buddy boy?
I'm out the door. Hey, pal.
translation.it: Io me ne vado. Senta, lei.

translation.en: -Where you going? -Manhattan.
You wanna take me with you?
translation.it: Le va di portarmi con sé?

translation.en: All right, I guess.
Hold on to your money. Later on.
translation.it: Metta via i soldi. A dopo.

translation.en: Okay, take care, Sonny.
See you.
Cadillac, I love it.
Surprise!
Just ignore him.
It's only Sonny. It's only Sonny.
translation.it: È solo Sonny. È solo Sonny.

translation.en: Yeah, it's only me. It's only me.
translation.it: Sì, sono solo io. Sono solo io e basta.

translation.en: -What's going on? -Corinne's going-away party for Kevin.
translation.it: - Cosa succede? - Festa di addio di Corinne per Kevin.

translation.en: She didn't tell me. The roommate has a right to know.
translation.it: A me non l'ha detto. Abito con lui.

translation.en: She knew you'd ruin the surprise.
No, I wouldn't.
Hey, surprise.
Surprise.
What's going on?
We wasted the good surprise on you.
translation.it: Abbiamo sprecato la sorpresa con te.

translation.en: All right.
Is this your handiwork?
I guess.
See you in three hours.
Good to see you stiffs. What've you been doing?
translation.it: È un piacere rivedervi. Che fate di bello?

translation.en: Last three weeks have been crazy. I've been in Denver, Dallas--
translation.it: Ho avuto tre settimane infernali. Sono stato a Denver, a Dallas--

translation.en: I'm sleeping in the office. We're going to trial on the fraud case.
translation.it: Io dormo in ufficio. Abbiamo il processo per quella truffa.

translation.en: Honey, it was a great surprise. I was totally shocked.
translation.it: È stata una sorpresa favolosa. Ero sconvolto.

translation.en: No, you weren't! And I worked so hard on this.
translation.it: No, non è vero! E ci ho lavorato così tanto.

translation.en: Need some help?
-Honey, your sister's here. -Hey, sweetie.
translation.it: - Amore, c'è tua sorella. - Ciao, tesoro.

translation.en: I hate Sonny.
My client's out $7 million. All we can sue on is breach of contract.
translation.it: Possiamo citarli solo per inadempienza contrattuale.

translation.en: Maybe you can sue under the Foreign Corrupt Practices Act.
translation.it: Puoi richiamare l'atto sulle corruzioni all'estero.

translation.en: I gotta get back to the office. You're the king.
translation.it: Devo tornare subito in ufficio. Sei un genio.

translation.en: Mikey, a pleasure.
-I'll see you at home. -All right.
translation.it: - Ci vediamo a casa. - Va bene.

translation.en: I'll walk you out.
I gotta admit, I'm still weirded out when they kiss.
translation.it: Mi fa ancora senso quando si baciano.

translation.en: Why? They're gay. That's what gay guys do.
translation.it: Perché? Sono gay. I gay fanno così.

translation.en: I know, but they were like brothers to us back in school.
translation.it: Sì, ma a scuola erano come fratelli per noi.

translation.en: They're still like our brothers. Our very, very gay brothers.
translation.it: Sono ancora come fratelli. Fratelli molto gay.

translation.en: What are you doing after this? Going to a Klan meeting?
translation.it: Cosa fai dopo? Una riunione del Klu Klux Klan?

translation.en: Remember when Dad had that barbecue... ...for his friends and it rained...
translation.it: Ricordi che papà organizzò una grigliata per i suoi amici ma piovve...

translation.en: ...so he and Mom went into the kitchen and made...
translation.it: ...e lui e mamma andarono in cucina...

translation.en: ...100 hamburgers with one frying pan?
translation.it: ...e cucinarono 100 hamburger con una sola padella?

translation.en: You're not gonna let a little rain stop you from making 100 hamburgers.
translation.it: Non lasciare che un po' di pioggia ti impedisca di cucinare 100 hamburger.

translation.en: That relationship's lasted longer than I thought it would.
translation.it: Quella relazione è durata più di quanto pensassi.

translation.en: Look at his eyes. He's bored. I give it two more weeks.
translation.it: Guardalo, è annoiatissimo. Gli do due settimane.

translation.en: Hey, excuse me. Everybody!
I'm sorry. I wanted to thank you for coming tonight.
translation.it: Scusate. Grazie per essere venuti stasera.

translation.en: I guess I should say--
I'm getting it. Tomorrow I'm leaving for China... ...to represent the firm of Morton and Mandel.
translation.it: Ora ci arrivo. Domani parto per la Cina, per lo studio Morton e Mandel.

translation.en: Me, the same guy who once shaved his ass to win a $5 bet.
translation.it: Io, quello che si rase il culo per una scommessa di cinque dollari.

translation.en: Prove it!
Just kidding.
But I am real glad you're all here tonight, because...
translation.it: Ma sono molto felice che siate tutti qui stasera perché...

translation.en: ...I'm gonna do what I never thought I'd have the guts to do.
translation.it: ...farò una cosa che pensavo di non avere il coraggio di fare.

translation.en: You're not proposing, are you?
-Yeah, pal, I am. -Well, think about it, you know?
translation.it: - Sì, amico. - Beh, ma pensaci bene, no?

translation.en: God, Sonny, shut up!
Anyway, will you?
Yeah.
Good call on the two weeks.
Sonny, what was that all about?
translation.it: Che ti è saltato in mente?

translation.en: Congratulations. You and Big Boobs McGee are gonna be happy.
translation.it: Congratulazioni. Tu e "tettona" McGee sarete felici.

translation.en: Don't call her that.
You wanna tell your children you met their mother as a waitress at Hooters?
translation.it: Dirai ai tuoi figli che lavorava da Hooters, il fast food supersexy?

translation.en: Sonny, that was five years ago. She's a doctor now...
translation.it: Sonny, sono passati cinque anni. Adesso è laureata...

translation.en: ...and my fiancée, so from now on...
translation.it: ...ed è la mia fidanzata, per cui chiamala...

translation.en: ...Dr. Big Boobs McGee.
-Congratulations. -Thanks, man.
I just...
...got shit going on.
What's the matter?
Vanessa's gonna break up with me...
...and I don't know how to make her wanna stay.
She's getting older. She wants different things.
translation.it: Sta diventando grande, vuole altre cose.

translation.en: Career, stable relationship, a family.
translation.it: Una carriera, un rapporto stabile, una famiglia.

translation.en: That's how they get.
I want things to go back to the way they used to be.
translation.it: Io voglio solo che torni tutto com'era prima.

translation.en: When we were at Syracuse, and Vanessa worshiped you.
translation.it: Quando eravamo a Syracuse e Vanessa ti venerava?

translation.en: -That was nice. -Nobody hassled you to get a job.
translation.it: - Non era male. - Nessuno pretendeva che lavorassi.

translation.en: Tommy and Phil showered separately.
translation.it: Tommy e Phil si lavavano separatamente.

translation.en: Those were the days.
-What're you doing? -If I make this...
translation.it: - Che fai? - Se la metto in buca...

translation.en: ...Vanessa will realize she likes me the way I am.
You're going to the putt.
Remember, the roof breaks to the right.
translation.it: Ricordati che il tetto pende a destra.

translation.en: Yes! That's what I'm talk--
Good God!
That can't be good.
Where's Kevin?
He already left. I guess he forgot to say goodbye to you.
translation.it: È già partito. Si sarà dimenticato di salutarti.

translation.en: -Why are you here? -I'm cleaning because you're useless.
translation.it: - Cosa fai qui? - Pulisco, perché tu sei incapace.

translation.en: Then what, you gonna go to your Hooters reunion?
translation.it: Poi vai alla riunione da Hooters?

translation.en: You guys talk about whose ass hangs out of their shorts the most?
translation.it: Per parlare di qual è il culo che esce più dai pantaloncini?

translation.en: At least I can fit my ass in my shorts, fatty.
translation.it: Almeno il mio c'entra nei pantaloncini, ciccione.

translation.en: Speaking of fatty, whose is this?
-I don't know. -I'm eating it then.
translation.it: - Non lo so. - Allora lo mangio io.

translation.en: "We wasted the good surprise on you."
Lady gave me $5 to bring him here.
translation.it: Una mi ha dato $5 per portarlo qui.

translation.en: -What do you mean? -Later.
Are you selling raffle tickets?
Oh, boy.
-Kevin Gerrity. -I got something to tell you.
translation.it: - Kevin Gerrity. - Devo dirti una cosa.

translation.en: -What's up? -There's a kid here.
What kind of kid?
If this note is true, it's your kid.
translation.it: Se il biglietto è vero, è il tuo.

translation.en: What do you mean?
I'm having a tough time reading this...
...but it says, "Dear Kevin: This is Julian, your son.
translation.it: ...ma dice: "Caro Kevin, questo è Julian, tuo figlio.

translation.en: I hope you understand why I didn't tell you until now...
translation.it: Spero capirai perché non te l'ho detto finora...

translation.en: ...but he needs your help. I can't be his mother anymore."
translation.it: ...ma gli serve il tuo aiuto. Non posso più essere sua madre".

translation.en: -This is ridiculous. -Hang on.
Who's this?
This is my friend.
-Is that Kevin on the phone? -No, it's my Uncle Remus.
translation.it: - Stai parlando con Kevin? - No, sto parlando con mio zio Tom.

translation.en: Hi. What's your name?
Is he all right?
He doesn't like you. Leave us alone.
translation.it: Non gli piaci tu. Lasciaci in pace.

translation.en: You're such a dick.
That was your girlfriend. She was acting "Hooterific."
translation.it: Era la tua fidanzata. Faceva la "hooter-splendida".

translation.en: -Who sent that note? -"Jan."
Jan.... I don't know any Jan.
-Where's he from? -Where are you from?
translation.it: - Da dove viene? - Da dove vieni?

translation.en: Buffalo.
I've never even been to Buffalo.
translation.it: Non sono mai stato a Buffalo.

translation.en: Maybe it's a mistake.
Is this like the time you said my parents were dead?
translation.it: È come quando mi dicesti che i miei erano morti?

translation.en: I swear, he's right here.
I'm coming home. I don't know what I'll say--
translation.it: Arrivo. Non so cosa dirò ai soci ma--

translation.en: Hang on. It says...
..."If you won't take responsibility for him, they found a foster family--"
translation.it: "Se non vuoi assumerti la responsabilità... ...hanno trovato una famiglia adottiva--"

translation.en: Yes, Uncle Remus, I know the catfish are huge.
translation.it: Sì, zio Tom, lo so, i pesci gatto sono enormi.

translation.en: That's terrific.
Here's a number for a guy...
translation.it: C'è il numero di un tipo...

translation.en: ...at City Social Service. Arthur Brooks. I'll call.
translation.it: ...dei servizi sociali, Arthur Brooks. Lo chiamo io.

translation.en: -I'll come home. -I'll take care of it.
translation.it: - Torno a casa. - Ci penso io.

translation.en: Are you sure?
Yeah, don't worry.
Hooters. Hooters. Hooters!
-All right. Thanks a lot. -Later.
I'm gonna make another phone call.
You want to come and sit down, pal?
Or you can stand there. Anything you want. I'll be a minute.
translation.it: Puoi anche rimanere lì. Come vuoi tu. Ci metto un attimo.

translation.en: Social Services is closed today, Columbus Day.
translation.it: L'ufficio rimarrà chiuso oggi per il Columbus Day.

translation.en: We'll be open tomorrow at 8 a.m.
Boy, I don't know what to tell you.
Everything's gonna get figured out tomorrow.
Can you be a tough little guy until then?
translation.it: Puoi fare il bravo ometto fino a domani?

translation.en: Great.
Do I need to get you a bottle of formula or something?
translation.it: Tu bevi ancora il latte in polvere o roba del genere?

translation.en: -No. -What do you eat?
Food.
Yeah? I eat food too.
What--? Come on.
You need me to hold your hand?
On Mondays, I go to Central Park and watch rollerbladers fall down.
translation.it: Di lunedì mi piace andare al Central Park a veder cadere i pattinatori.

translation.en: -You into that? -I don't know.
translation.it: - A te piace? - Non lo so.

translation.en: Watch. This guy's humming.
He's going down, he's going down, he's going--!
translation.it: Ora cade, ora cade, ora cade--

translation.en: How old are you, anyways?
-Five. -Five?
You wear a diaper?
-You wipe your own ass then? -Yes.
translation.it: - Ti pulisci il culetto da solo? - Sì.

translation.en: You do? Good job. That's cool.
Come on, fall down. Fall down. Yes! Come on, damn it.
translation.it: Avanti, cadi, cadi! E dai, accidenti.

translation.en: You suck. You suck!
Check this out.
My God!
There's a stick there. Somebody should move it.
translation.it: C'è un bastone. Qualcuno dovrebbe toglierlo.

translation.en: All right now, what way would you put that on?
translation.it: D'accordo, allora, da che parte si mette?

translation.en: This Columbo, he pretends to be stupid...
translation.it: Colombo fa finta di essere stupido...

translation.en: ...but he's really smart as a tack.
Oh, yeah, he is.
You put the vane on down there. Then this boat comes up.
translation.it: Si mette il segnavento lì e poi la barca viene su.

translation.en: I wipe my own ass.
translation.it: Mi pulisco il culetto da solo.

translation.en: Me too.
So, Mr. Ass Wiper, what's this guy's name?
translation.it: Dimmi, signor Pulisciculetto, come si chiama questo tipo?

translation.en: Does he ever take his flippers off?
What if he goes bowling?
They don't make him wear bowling shoes? He wears flippers?
translation.it: Non deve mettersi le scarpe da bowling? Tiene le pinne?

translation.en: -Really? -I had a doll like that at one time.
translation.it: - Davvero? - Anch'io avevo un pupazzo così.

translation.en: But my cat, he bite his head off.
translation.it: Ma il mio gatto gli ha staccato la testa.

translation.en: What cat would do that?
You calling me a liar?
Hey, take it easy.
Anyways...
...Jets are playing tonight.
We're gonna go to the Blarney Stone. Wanna come?
translation.it: Noi andiamo al Blarney Stone. Vieni con noi?

translation.en: I've got more deliveries.
Maybe you can also finish the turkey on your lip.
translation.it: E magari finisci quel pezzo di tacchino.

translation.en: Right there.
Let's crank up the Styx.
No music during the game.
-It's halftime. Relax, Mr. Herlihy. -Goddamn Jets.
translation.it: - È l'intervallo, signor Herlihy. - Fottutissimi Jets.

translation.en: What are you doing in here, cutie?
translation.it: Tu che ci fai qui, piccolo?

translation.en: Watching football.
-Who do you want to win? -The goddamn Jets.
translation.it: - Chi vuoi che vinca? - I fottutissimi Jets.

translation.en: Have fun.
Too bad you don't like girls. I think you could've had her.
translation.it: Peccato che non ti piacciano le ragazze. Quella sarebbe già tua.

translation.en: -I'm thirsty. -You're thirsty?
-Are you allowed soda? -I don't know.
translation.it: - Puoi bere bibite gassate? - Non lo so.

translation.en: My mom always said soda rots your teeth...
translation.it: Dicono che fanno marcire i denti...

translation.en: ...but you'll lose them anyway, so rot on.
translation.it: ...ma tanto ti cadranno quindi vai col marciume.

translation.en: -Can we get two root beers? -Sure.
translation.it: - Ci puoi portare due cola? - Subito.

translation.en: When I graduated law school, we met here every Monday to watch football.
translation.it: Quando studiavo legge, ci trovavamo qui ogni lunedì per vedere le partite.

translation.en: Who would meet you?
My friends, Vanessa.
Vanessa always rooted against the team... ...I wanted to win just to bust my chops.
translation.it: Vanessa tifava sempre per l'altra squadra solo per darmi contro.

translation.en: But everybody's so busy with their crap lately, no one comes.
translation.it: Ma ormai sono tutti impegnati con i loro casini e non vengono più.

translation.en: Like I'm not busy?
Shut up or I'll smack you through the wall like last Monday.
translation.it: Silenzio o la sbatto contro il muro come lunedì scorso.

translation.en: Last Monday was a fluke. Bring it on, woman.
translation.it: Lunedì scorso era pura fortuna. Fatti sotto, femminuccia.

translation.en: Anytime.
He drinks a lot of soda.
I'm telling you, buddy. Vanessa, she's the one. I can't lose her.
translation.it: Dico sul serio. Vanessa è la donna giusta, non posso perderla.

translation.en: I'm not getting any handsomer.
Every day I get a little bit older and balder and fatter.
translation.it: Ogni giorno divento solo più vecchio, più calvo e più grasso.

translation.en: -Fatter? -At your age...
...I could eat anything. Wouldn't gain an ounce.
translation.it: ...mangiavo di tutto e non ingrassavo un etto.

translation.en: Now, I have a chocolate shake, my ass jiggles for a week.
translation.it: Ora bevo un frappé di cioccolato e le mie chiappe ballano per giorni.

translation.en: -Enjoy the metabolism while you got it. -Metalobism?
translation.it: - Goditi il metabolismo finché puoi. - Metalobismo?

translation.en: Good God, it's 2:30 in the morning. You must be wrecked.
translation.it: Mamma santa, sono le 2.30 del mattino. Devi essere stravolto.

translation.en: Anyways, I had fun today. Did you have fun?
translation.it: Ad ogni modo, io mi sono divertito oggi. Tu ti sei divertito?

translation.en: Yeah, you're all right.
Have a good one.
Could I have a night-light?
Night-light? I think I can help you out. Hang on.
translation.it: Una lucetta? Aspetta, ho quello che ci vuole.

translation.en: Let's see here.
There you go, all right?
Are you my dad?
No, I'm not, but...
...that Dad and Mom thing we'll figure out in the morning.
translation.it: ...sistemiamo la faccenda di mamma e papà domattina.

translation.en: You just go to sleep.
-Good night. -Good night.
Go get the can, okay?
translation.it: Vai a prendere la lattina, okay?

translation.en: Go! Go! Go!
I'm thinking about keeping the kid.
translation.it: Sto pensando di tenermi il bambino.

translation.en: Remember when we went to the pet store...
translation.it: Ti ricordi quella volta, nel negozio di animali...

translation.en: ...and you wanted that puppy, but I reminded you about feeding it...
translation.it: ...quando volevi un cucciolo e ti dissi che dovevi sfamarlo...

translation.en: ...cleaning it and toilet training it?
translation.it: ...pulirlo e fargli fare i suoi bisogni?

translation.en: This is kind of like that, except with a human.
translation.it: Beh, è la stessa cosa, però con un essere umano.

translation.en: I mean, I'm glad you had fun and all, but this is big.
translation.it: Sono contento che ti diverti ma è una cosa enorme.

translation.en: I gotta do something big. I think Vanessa will respect that.
translation.it: Devo fare una cosa enorme. Vanessa l'apprezzerà.

translation.en: You think that since women get pregnant... ...to fix a troubled relationship...
translation.it: Allora, se le donne fanno figli per salvare una relazione...

translation.en: ...why can't a guy adopt a kid to do the same?
translation.it: ...un uomo può adottarne uno per lo stesso motivo?

translation.en: I didn't think of it like that. But yes, that's what I'm thinking.
translation.it: Non ci avevo pensato in quei termini ma sì, lo penso.

translation.en: Sounds nuts to me, pal. Do yourself a favor. Sleep on it.
translation.it: A me sembra una follia. Fatti un favore, dormici sopra.

translation.en: You're right. Can I use your phone?
translation.it: Hai ragione. Mi presti il cellulare?

translation.en: Arthur Brooks speaking.
How you doing? Kevin Gerrity.
Right on, Mr. Gerrity.
We were expecting you.
Do you still got a foster family lined up for Julian?
translation.it: Avete sempre una famiglia adottiva in lista per Julian?

translation.en: Yes, we do.
I've decided to take care of the little guy.
translation.it: Ho deciso di prendermi cura io del piccolino.

translation.en: Way to sleep on it, pal.
You two want to get married, I support that.
translation.it: Se voi due volete sposarvi, io vi appoggio.

translation.en: When parents take the responsibility, there's no bigger high for us.
translation.it: Quando un genitore naturale si assume la responsabilità, siamo felicissimi.

translation.en: I'm psyched about it too.
So that's it.
Yep. Good luck to you and your son.
translation.it: Già, auguri a lei e a suo figlio.

translation.en: My son.
Goddamn stick!
That's my boy.
Go back to sleep.
Well, I'm going back to sleep. Nighty-night.
translation.it: Io mi rimetto a dormire. Buona notte.

translation.en: I wet my bed.
Oh, God.
That's a shitload of piss.
translation.it: Ma quella è una marea di pipì.

translation.en: There you go, all right?
No more wet mess.
Sleep, all right? Just try to sleep. Stay asleep.
translation.it: Dormi, capito? Cerca di dormire. Resta addormentato.

translation.en: Sit still!
Lay!
All right! I'm up!
It smells like urine in this joint. Good job.
translation.it: C'è puzza di pipì in questa stanza. Molto bravo.

translation.en: What're you doing there, boy?
Making cereal.
Oh, yeah? Why don't you pour me a bowl?
translation.it: Davvero? Ne prepari una ciotola anche a me?

translation.en: Or don't pour me a bowl. Either way.
I got it. I got it.
We can fix this.
It's not a big deal.
Look. See?
See how quick it goes away?
Crybaby, come on.
Don't worry about it, boy.
Scuba Steve, damn you!
You think that's funny, me getting hurt?
translation.it: Trovi divertente che io mi faccia male?

translation.en: There's a bright side to being up before 11: McDonald's breakfast.
translation.it: Il bello di alzarsi prima delle 11 è la colazione da McDonald.

translation.en: I haven't been up for that in 10 years. You wanna go?
translation.it: Non mi alzo in tempo da 10 anni. Vuoi?

translation.en: Tie your shoes, we'll go. Hurry.
It's like 12 blocks from here, so tie quickly.
translation.it: È a 12 isolati da qui quindi allaccia in fretta.

translation.en: Do you need help with that?
I can do it.
Let me do it.
You loop it, you swoop it, and you pull.
You loop it, you swoop it, you pull.
Good. Let's go. We're in a hurry.
It's different for your generation.
You've always had McDonald's breakfast available.
translation.it: Voi avete sempre avuto la colazione da McDonald.

translation.en: I have?
When I was born, all we had were the burgers and fries.
translation.it: Quando sono nato io, c'erano solo hamburger e patatine.

translation.en: Maybe the fish sandwich. I'm not sure. I'll get back to you.
translation.it: Forse il panino col pesce ma non ne sono sicuro. Ti dirò.

translation.en: What are you doing?
Oh, yeah, the hand-holding thing.
translation.it: Ah, già, la storia della mano.

translation.en: My dad took us to McDonald's the first morning they had breakfast.
translation.it: Mio padre ci portò da McDonald la prima volta che servirono la colazione.

translation.en: Everybody was baffled. "Are these sausages or hamburgers?"
translation.it: Erano tutti sconcertati. "Sono salsicce o hamburger?"

translation.en: I have to go to the bathroom.
We're gonna be there in a minute.
I gotta go now.
Didn't you pee enough in bed?
translation.it: Non l'hai fatta tutta nel letto?

translation.en: We only got nine minutes to get there.
translation.it: Abbiamo solo nove minuti per arrivare.

translation.en: But I gotta go to the bathroom.
translation.it: Ma io devo andare al bagno.

translation.en: All right, let's go.
Can my kid use the bathroom for a minute?
translation.it: Mio figlio può usare un attimo il bagno?

translation.en: Customers only.
He's just a kid. We'll be in and out.
That's not my problem.
It's not your problem? All right.
translation.it: Non è un suo problema? Come vuole.

translation.en: Come on.
Here you are. Your waiter will be right with you.
translation.it: Ecco. Il vostro cameriere sarà subito da voi.

translation.en: I can't do it.
What do you mean, you can't do it? Just go.
translation.it: Come, non ci riesci? Falla e basta.

translation.en: I'm scared. Could you do it too?
translation.it: Ho paura. La puoi fare anche tu?

translation.en: All right.
Here we go.
And we're off.
That's not too difficult, right?
translation.it: Non è poi così difficile, no?

translation.en: And we're both losing weight.
Good job. We're gonna miss breakfast. Let's go.
translation.it: Ottimo. Dai che ci perdiamo la colazione. Andiamo.

translation.en: Put it away.
-Thanks, anyways. -Sure thing. Anytime.
translation.it: - Grazie lo stesso. - Di niente. Quando vuole.

translation.en: Move your ass there, pee-boy.
We only got five minutes, five minutes. Now four.
translation.it: Abbiamo solo cinque minuti, cinque minuti. Adesso quattro.

translation.en: Come on. We're almost there.
Hey, mister. Why are you sitting on the ground?
translation.it: Ciao, signore. Perché sei seduto per terra?

translation.en: This is where I live.
-We gotta get going. -Why?
In retrospect, I made some bad choices after high school.
translation.it: Ripensandoci, ho fatto delle pessime scelte dopo il liceo.

translation.en: -We gotta get going. -Why?
This was during the so-called Disco Era...
translation.it: Era la cosiddetta era della disco music...

translation.en: ...but for me, it was more the Doing Mushrooms Era.
translation.it: ...ma, nel mio caso, l'era dei funghi allucinogeni.

translation.en: -We're gonna miss breakfast. -Why?
I never thought about that.
I was never Mr. Popularity in high school...
translation.it: Non ero tra i più popolari al liceo...

translation.en: ...and I watched Fantasia a lot.
-One day it clicked. -Hey, yappy.
If you end it, you get an Egg McMuffin.
translation.it: Se la fai finita, ti porto un Egg McMuffin.

translation.en: How about a Sausage McMuffin with hash browns?
You got a deal.
Look, look. He fell asleep. Let's go.
translation.it: Guarda, guarda. Si è addormentato. Andiamo.

translation.en: Let's go.
Sausage McMuffin.
Pardon me, sir.
How you doing?
What can I get for you?
-What do you want? -Cheerios.
They don't got Cheerios.
Lasagna.
What's the matter? We'll take hotcakes and sausage.
translation.it: Cosa ti succede? Prenderemo frittelle e salsicce.

translation.en: Sorry. We stopped serving breakfast.
translation.it: Mi spiace. Non serviamo più la colazione.

translation.en: We're four seconds late.
translation.it: Siamo in ritardo di quattro secondi.

translation.en: You're 30 minutes and four seconds late. Breakfast stops at 10:30.
translation.it: Trenta minuti e quattro secondi. Smettiamo di servirla alle 10:30.

translation.en: Horseshit!
Don't cry. Sorry.
I was cursing at the lady, not you.
translation.it: Ce l'avevo con lei, non con te.

translation.en: Nice parenting.
Thanks. Are you my therapist? Take a walk.
translation.it: Grazie. È il mio psicologo? Vada a farsi un giro.

translation.en: Do you want a Happy Meal?
You got a Happy Meal?
Will somebody get the kid a Happy Meal?!
translation.it: Qualcuno gli porta un Happy Meal?

translation.en: Relax.
Where's my Egg McMuffin?
Breakfast is over at 10:30.
-Really? I thought it was 11. -I thought that too.
translation.it: - Davvero? Credevo alle 11. - Lo credevo anch'io.

translation.en: Total mind blower.
Will you just relax? Here.
What do you want me to do?
You're gonna meet Vanessa tonight. You'll like her.
You wanna see me get hurt? That'll cheer you up?
translation.it: Vuoi che mi faccia male? Poi starai meglio?

translation.en: All right.
You think that's funny?
Good. No more crying.
Are you okay?
Next time, kill me.
Let's do it, Rangers.
--Rangers against the Tampa Bay Lightning.
translation.it: --I Rangers contro i Tampa Bay Lightning.

translation.en: And at this stage...
...it's as close as you can get to a must-win game for the Rangers.
translation.it: ...i Rangers devono vincere a tutti i costi.

translation.en: Or they'll fall behind--
-How you doing? -How you doing?
-You like hockey? -You like hockey?
translation.it: Ti piace l'hockey? Ti piace l'hockey?

translation.en: This is a big, important game.
This is a big, important game.
-Cut the crap. -Cut the crap.
translation.it: Dacci un taglio. Dacci un taglio.

translation.en: I'm serious. Don't do that.
I'm serious. Don't do that.
How much wood would a woodchuck chuck... ...if a woodchuck could chuck wood?
translation.it: Sopra la panca la capra campa, sotto la campa la capra crepa.

translation.en: That's what I thought. Shut up.
Don't you take naps?
Sometimes.
Go take a nap.
I'm too hungry to sleep.
You want some food?
Having a kid is great...
...as long as his eyes are closed and he's not moving or speaking.
translation.it: ...finché tiene gli occhi chiusi, non si muove e non parla.

translation.en: He's taken down! Penalty shot!
How you doing? You sleepwalking?
Why don't you go back sleepy? Sleepy.
translation.it: Perché non torni a fare la nanna?

translation.en: Keep napping. What's this?
Kangaroo song.
That's terrific. And we'll watch this after the game, okay?
translation.it: Fantastico. La guardiamo dopo la partita, ci stai?

translation.en: But after my nap, I always watch the kangaroo song.
translation.it: Dopo il riposino guardo sempre la canzone del canguro.

translation.en: It's overtime, and there's a penalty shot about to take place.
translation.it: Sono ai tempi supplementari e stanno per battere il rigore.

translation.en: It happens every 10 years--
Kangaroo song. Kangaroo song!
translation.it: La canzone del canguro. La canzone del canguro!

translation.en: All right!
God! You were normal yesterday.
I can't take this. Are you serious?
translation.it: Non la reggo. Fai sul serio?

translation.en: Come and play
What do you say?
Douche-bag kangaroo.
Are you all hopped out?
I don't know what to do. Hopefully Vanessa will.
translation.it: Non so cosa fare. Spero che Vanessa lo sappia.

translation.en: I think she's back. If she's not back, we'll wait for her.
translation.it: Credo che sia tornata. Se non lo è, l'aspetteremo.

translation.en: Get your coat. Clean up.
Oh, God. You don't have to pee, do you?
translation.it: Oh, Dio. Non devi far pipì, vero?

translation.en: -Do you swear? -I swear.
How come you're not going?
I don't have to go. Only you and my grandfather go every 30 seconds.
translation.it: Perché non mi scappa. Solo tu e mio nonno la fate ogni 30 secondi.

translation.en: Let's hurry it up, all right? I'm keeping you company.
translation.it: Sbrigati, va bene? Ti faccio compagnia.

translation.en: He'll write your name on the wall. Mind your business.
translation.it: Come si chiama? Glielo scrive sul muro. Giratevi.

translation.en: Let's go. Let's go.
Why do I need to meet this lady?
-Now it is your problem. -Thank you.
translation.it: - Ora è un problema suo. - Grazie.

translation.en: She's that lady I was telling you about.
translation.it: Ti ho già parlato di lei.

translation.en: She's gonna be a big part of your life.
translation.it: Avrà un ruolo importante nella tua vita.

translation.en: I'm scared. What if she's not nice?
translation.it: Ho paura. Se non è buona che succede?

translation.en: Look.
See these right here? These are magic sunglasses, okay?
translation.it: Li vedi questi? Sono occhiali da sole magici, va bene?

translation.en: If you're afraid, put them on to become invisible.
translation.it: Se hai paura li metti e diventi invisibile.

translation.en: Really? Nobody can see me?
Put them on.
Sonny, I'm right here.
Oh, the glasses. I couldn't see you.
Keep those on. No one can notice you until you decide they can.
translation.it: Tienili, così nessuno può vederti finché non lo decidi tu.

translation.en: -Okay. -Let's go.
I'm still right here.
Okay, all right, the glasses.
Welcome back.
-Who's that? -Who's who? He's invisible.
translation.it: - Lui chi è? - Chi è chi? È invisibile.

translation.en: -Can I come in? -Sure.
Any invisible people out here...
...feel free to come in, okay?
Sonny, I don't really know what's going on right now.
translation.it: Sonny, non capisco cosa stia succedendo.

translation.en: -We should talk-- -You said I got some thinking to do?
translation.it: - Dovremmo parlare-- - Tu mi hai detto di riflettere.

translation.en: So I did it.
Just because I don't have a job doesn't mean I don't wanna move on.
translation.it: Solo perché non ho un lavoro non vuol dire che non voglia crescere.

translation.en: Instead of saying that, I figured I'd show you.
translation.it: Invece di dirlo e basta, te lo volevo dimostrare.

translation.en: -Before you say anything-- -Look at that.
translation.it: - Prima che tu dica altro-- - Guarda.

translation.en: He took his sunglasses off.
He wants you to see him. He likes you.
translation.it: Vuole che tu lo veda. Gli piaci.

translation.en: Julian, come here.
Come here, pal.
...I want you to meet Julian, my son.
Our son. I adopted him.
I don't know what to say.
Don't say anything.
Is someone in the bathroom?
Why is the door shut?
-I don't know. -You don't?
-I don't know. -Sonny.
I can't believe this.
-Hey. Open up. -Sonny.
Hello. Open the door!
-Is everything okay? -Oh, my God.
translation.it: - È tutto a posto? - Oh, mio Dio.

translation.en: I'm sorry. I was freaking out there.
translation.it: Scusi, stavo andando fuori di testa.

translation.en: -I'm Sonny. -Sid.
I had an attack of paranoia. I thought you were sleeping with my girl.
translation.it: Ero paranoico. Credevo che andasse a letto con la mia ragazza.

translation.en: I am.
What's that?
I am.
That's what I was trying to tell you before. I found someone.
translation.it: È quello che stavo cercando di dirti. Ho trovato qualcuno.

translation.en: -This old guy? -Sid.
He's already achieved so much...
...and yet he's still goal-oriented and still focused.
And he has a five-year plan.
What is it? "Don't die"?
I can't believe this. We got a family now. This is what you wanted.
translation.it: Non posso crederci. Ora abbiamo una famiglia. È quello che volevi.

translation.en: You surprising me with a kid that you adopted...
translation.it: Mi sorprendi con un bambino adottato...

translation.en: -...wasn't what I wanted. -I did this for you.
translation.it: - Non è quello che volevo. - L'ho fatto per te.

translation.en: You wanted me to be more responsible.
I can't raise this kid alone.
You remind me of my grandson. You don't think things through.
translation.it: Mi ricordi mio nipote. Non rifletti sulle cose fino in fondo.

translation.en: Hey, Old Man River, zip it or I'll break your hip.
translation.it: Senti, matusa, chiudi il becco o ti spezzo il femore.

translation.en: -I'd like to see you try it. -Shut up.
translation.it: - Provaci, se hai il coraggio. - Zitto.

translation.en: How'd you misconstrue the situation so badly?
translation.it: Come hai potuto fraintendere fino a questo punto?

translation.en: I don't know.
Deep down you must've known this day was coming.
translation.it: Sapevi che questo giorno sarebbe arrivato.

translation.en: You made the biggest mistake of your life.
translation.it: È il più grande errore della tua vita.

translation.en: I know you'll be missing me when you got...
translation.it: So che ti mancherò quando avrai...

translation.en: ...that big, white, wrinkly...
...body on top of you...
...with his loose skin...
...and old balls.
Gross.
Excuse me. How you doing? I'm Kevin Gerrity.
translation.it: Mi scusi. Come sta? Sono Kevin Gerrity.

translation.en: I got an emergency problem. Is Arthur Brooks around?
translation.it: Ho una piccola emergenza. C'è Arthur Brooks?

translation.en: I'll go get him for you.
Stay where I can see you. I gotta talk to this guy.
translation.it: Siediti dove ti posso vedere. Devo parlare con il signore.

translation.en: Mr. Gerrity?
-Arthur Brooks. -How are you? I need to speak with you.
translation.it: - Arthur Brooks. - Come va? Devo parlarle.

translation.en: I didn't tell you to come here, did I?
translation.it: Non le ho chiesto di venire, vero?

translation.en: I was gonna mail you the paperwork.
It's like the opposite of that.
Look, I can't manage this kid.
translation.it: Senta, io non ce la faccio.

translation.en: I ain't a good father. I made a big mistake.
translation.it: Non sono un buon padre. Ho commesso un errore.

translation.en: -Mistake? -I had a mother lined up for him...
translation.it: - Un errore? - Avevo una madre pronta per lui...

translation.en: ...but she's banging the Pepperidge Farm guy.
translation.it: ...ma ora si scopa il nonno di Pepperidge Farm.

translation.en: The kid won't stop peeing and throwing up.
translation.it: Il piccolo non smette di pisciare e vomitare.

translation.en: He's like a cocker spaniel. I just....
translation.it: È come un cocker. Non posso...

translation.en: He'd be better off with his natural mother.
translation.it: Starebbe molto meglio con la madre naturale.

translation.en: Well, she passed away last night, Mr. Gerrity.
translation.it: È venuta a mancare ieri sera, signor Gerrity.

translation.en: She had cancer. She must have sensed...
translation.it: Aveva il cancro. Probabilmente sentiva di...

translation.en: ...that her time was running short.
She wanted her son to be with the natural father.
translation.it: Voleva che suo figlio stesse con il padre naturale.

translation.en: Loop.
Pull.
If you don't wanna take care of him...
...we'll take him. But he'll have to chill in a group home.
translation.it: ...lo prendiamo noi. Ma per ora, dovremo metterlo in una casa-famiglia.

translation.en: Group home? Like an orphanage?
We don't call them that.
Look, I did it. Loop, swoop and pull.
translation.it: Guarda, ce l'ho fatta. Giri, rigiri e tiri.

translation.en: You did do it.
Congratulations, kid.
I showed him that.
Why don't you go back over there, okay?
translation.it: Perché non te ne torni laggiù?

translation.en: -I'll call the Heatherton Home-- -Let's do this.
translation.it: - Intanto chiamo Casa Heatherton-- - Facciamo così.

translation.en: I'll hang on to the kid until you find him a new family.
translation.it: Terrò io il bambino finché non trova una nuova famiglia.

translation.en: I don't know. I gotta watch out for the kid's best interest.
translation.it: Non saprei. Devo agire nell'interesse del bambino.

translation.en: You said yourself you were a bogus dad.
translation.it: Ha detto che è un padre inetto.

translation.en: He's better off with me than in an orphanage.
translation.it: Meglio con me che in un orfanotrofio.

translation.en: I don't wanna put him in a home any more than you do.
translation.it: Io ci tengo meno di lei a metterlo in un istituto.

translation.en: Why don't we pretend you didn't even come in here?
translation.it: Perché non facciamo finta che non sia mai venuto?

translation.en: I'll give you a shout when I line up a family.
translation.it: E le do una voce quando trovo una famiglia.

translation.en: -That's good. -Later.
Just don't make me regret this.
Where are we going now?
I gotta make a phone call. Just stay right here, all right?
translation.it: Devo fare una telefonata. Tu rimani qui, va bene?

translation.en: -This is a collect call from: -Your baby boy.
translation.it: - Chiamata a carico da... - Il tuo bambino.

translation.en: -To accept charges, say, "Yes." -Yeah, I'll accept.
translation.it: - Se accetta l'addebito dica: "Sì". - Sì, accetto.

translation.en: Dad, how's it going? How's Florida?
translation.it: Come va, papà? Com'è la Florida?

translation.en: Not too bad. Your mother got a sunburn playing tennis.
translation.it: Non male. Tua madre si è ustionata giocando a tennis.

translation.en: -I got some interesting news. -Oh, yeah? What?
translation.it: - Ho una notizia interessante. - Davvero? Quale?

translation.en: Kind of adopted a kid.
What do you mean?
I'm talking about you being a grandfather.
translation.it: Vado dicendo che sei diventato nonno.

translation.en: Who the hell would give you a kid?
translation.it: Chi darebbe mai un figlio a te?

translation.en: Social Services.
You idiot. You better give that kid back.
His mother's....
Hang on.
Go play with them pigeons, buddy.
translation.it: Vai a giocare con quei piccioni.

translation.en: I tried to give him back. I just can't. All right?
translation.it: Ho provato a restituirlo. Ma non posso, va bene?

translation.en: I need your help.
I'm in a bad way. Vanessa dumped me. I don't know what I'm doing.
translation.it: Sono messo male. Vanessa mi ha mollato. Non so cosa sto facendo.

translation.en: You're damn right.
The kid is always around.
He never leaves me alone.
translation.it: Non mi ha lasciato solo un attimo.

translation.en: You'd think he'd want some privacy. I'm in deep shit.
translation.it: Almeno volesse un po' di privacy. Sono nella merda.

translation.en: Give that kid back before you ruin both your lives.
translation.it: Restituisci quel bambino prima di rovinare la vita di entrambi.

translation.en: I appreciate that.
He's better off living in a dumpster.
I'll be a better father than you!
translation.it: Sarò un padre migliore di te.

translation.en: Impossible! All you care about is yourself!
translation.it: Impossibile! Perché tu pensi solo a te stesso!

translation.en: Yeah? No, I care about you saving money on this call!
translation.it: Ah, sì? Invece penso anche a farti risparmiare sulla chiamata.

translation.en: Let's eat.
The Vanessa thing did not work out.
translation.it: Il capitolo Vanessa non ha funzionato.

translation.en: She lost her damn mind. That wasn't your fault, though, okay?
translation.it: Le ha dato di volta il cervello ma non è colpa tua, capito?

translation.en: I know when you first got here... ...you thought you were gonna meet your dad.
translation.it: So che quando sei arrivato, credevi che avresti conosciuto tuo padre.

translation.en: But I don't think that's gonna happen.
-Why? -I don't know.
But, buddy, real dads aren't always that great.
translation.it: Ma i veri papà non sono sempre il massimo.

translation.en: I got one and he's out of his mind.
translation.it: Il mio è fuori di testa.

translation.en: He tells me what to do. He never lets me figure stuff out on my own.
translation.it: Mi dice sempre cosa fare. Non mi lascia mai decidere per conto mio.

translation.en: A lot of dads are like that. That's why people grow up nuts.
translation.it: Molti papà sono così. Ecco perché tanti crescono male.

translation.en: Look at this guy.
He was probably a nice boy like you. Then his dad messed his mind up.
translation.it: Sarà stato un bravo bambino come te. Poi suo padre lo ha ridotto così.

translation.en: Who won the Jets game?
Who cares?
Let it go. He can't control you anymore.
translation.it: Sfogati pure, non può più controllarti.

translation.en: What do you mean?
-You know. -You're a loser.
You're mad at your dad, not at me! I forgive you!
translation.it: Ce l'hai con tuo padre, non con me. Ti perdono!

translation.en: I am. I am. I hate my father.
translation.it: È vero, io odio mio padre.

translation.en: I don't want it to be like that. I don't wanna control you.
translation.it: Io non voglio essere così. Io non voglio controllarti.

translation.en: -You even like your name? -I guess.
translation.it: - Ti piace il tuo nome? - Credo.

translation.en: You guess? Shouldn't you like your name?
It'll be your name the rest of your life.
translation.it: Il tuo nome ti rimane per tutta la vita.

translation.en: What do you want?
I can deal with that. I'll call you Frankenstein.
translation.it: Si può fare. Ti chiamerò Frankenstein.

translation.en: Frankenstein, you gonna play in the puddle?
Go ahead. From now on, you do whatever you wanna do.
translation.it: Fai pure. D'ora in poi, puoi fare tutto quello che vuoi.

translation.en: I'll show you some cool shit along the way.
translation.it: E intanto ti mostro qualche bel trucchetto.

translation.en: That's what it's all about.
translation.it: È di questo che si tratta.

translation.en: Stay in front of it. Don't be scared.
It's coming right at you.
Okay. All right.
You're picking your head up. Don't do that.
translation.it: Stai tirando su la testa, non farlo.

translation.en: Is this okay?
That's what you wanna wear?
That's okay with me then.
Good luck walking down the street.
translation.it: Tanti auguri quando vai per strada.

translation.en: Way to block it. Stay with it.
You're the next Willie Randolph.
Chief Jay Strongbow used to do a sleeper hold.
translation.it: Il grande Jay Strongbow faceva la "presa del dormiglione".

translation.en: Put your arm under here.
Lift this arm, okay? Slide under and try to lock wrists.
translation.it: Poi alzagli il braccio, d'accordo? Scivola sotto e bloccagli i polsi.

translation.en: Let me show you. Watch.
Throw him into the ropes and he comes back....
translation.it: Lo butti contro le corde e quando rimbalza...

translation.en: Get him. Get him. Lock him up.
translation.it: Lo prendi. Lo prendi. Lo blocchi.

translation.en: Lock wrists.
You bring him down slow.
Apply pressure.
He's going to sleep now.
See, he's out.
Wake up.
You'll be the only kid your age with a slingshot.
translation.it: Sarai l'unico bambino della tua età con una fionda.

translation.en: Go have some fun. Shoot a few beer cans or something.
translation.it: Vai a divertirti. Colpisci un paio di lattine.

translation.en: You like that?
Sonny, Sonny, come here!
What is it? What's the matter?
Let me have that.
Go to your room. I think. Or do whatever you want.
translation.it: Vai in camera tua. Credo. O fai quello che vuoi.

translation.en: It's gonna be fun. You nervous?
No? You're excited, aren't you?
Let's go. Up, up, up.
Here comes some candy.
How you doing?
Happy Halloween! We got a first-timer.
Do the right thing, buddy.
We want some candy!
Hang on right here for a second. Don't move.
translation.it: Rimani qui un attimo. Non ti muovere.

translation.en: Yeah, that's it.
Yeah, CDs. You like that?
He's not happy. What else you got?
Okay, that's good. Trick-or-treat.
-Say, "Happy Halloween." -Happy Halloween.
Thank you.
Next year, be prepared, moron.
What's with the cummerbund?
I let him wear whatever he wants.
translation.it: Gli lascio mettere quello che vuole.

translation.en: Those boots are the best.
I think they're Kevin's.
I'll have a hot dog with the mustard and a knish.
translation.it: Per me un hot dog con senape e un rustico.

translation.en: Frankenstein, what do you want?
Thirty packets of ketchup.
All right. Thirty packets of ketchup.
translation.it: Vai così. Trenta bustine di ketchup.

translation.en: Nice cut, pal.
Do that thing I taught you the other day.
translation.it: Fai quella cosa che ti ho insegnato.

translation.en: It took him 20 minutes to learn that. He's quick. He's smart.
translation.it: L'ha imparato in 20 minuti. È sveglio e intelligente.

translation.en: -And he loves ketchup. -He does.
translation.it: - E adora il ketchup. - È vero.

translation.en: This is a whole new school of child raising.
You give him options, not orders. Let him make the decision.
translation.it: Gli do libera scelta invece di ordini. Lascio decidere a lui.

translation.en: You're a pioneer.
-So you two just chill out all day? -Basically.
translation.it: - Andate a zonzo tutto il giorno? - Praticamente sì.

translation.en: Hung out on the monkey bars. The kid did eight chin-ups.
translation.it: Ieri al parco ha fatto otto sospensioni sulle sbarre.

translation.en: I can't even do one with these scrawny arms.
translation.it: Io non potrei mai, con queste braccia striminzite.

translation.en: They're not scrawny. They're nice.
What do you wanna do tomorrow?
I wanna go to school.
I don't force him, he makes the right decision. Way to go.
translation.it: Non lo forzo e lui prende la decisione giusta. Bravo, piccolo.

translation.en: We'll enroll you on Monday. Enjoy the weekend.
translation.it: Lunedì ti iscriviamo. Goditi il weekend.

translation.en: Do the thing again.
That one touched the ground.
That was awesome!
Good job.
Help me! Help me!
Please help me. I don't know where I live.
translation.it: Aiutami, per favore. Non so dove abito.

translation.en: This isn't a big problem.
We'll find your parents.
-What's your name? -Frankenstein.
-Frankenstein. Okay. -There you are.
There you are. Are you okay, buddy?
I turn my head and he disappeared.
translation.it: Giro la testa e lui scompare.

translation.en: Don't you ever do that to me again. Don't do that.
translation.it: Non farmelo mai più. Non lo fare.

translation.en: Thank you for being sweet to my little boy.
translation.it: Grazie di essere stata così gentile con il mio bambino.

translation.en: -You're welcome, Sonny. -Sonny?
I think my sister, Corinne, is engaged to your roommate.
translation.it: Credo che mia sorella Corinne sia fidanzata con il tuo amico.

translation.en: Your sister's Corinne? That sucks.
Yeah, I'm up from D.C. I was at that party...
translation.it: Sono venuta da Washington. Ero a quella festa...

translation.en: ...where we wasted the good surprise on you.
translation.it: ...in cui abbiamo sprecato la sorpresa con te.

translation.en: Sorry about that.
So, what, you have a son now?
I'm not his dad. I'm more of a father-figure type...
translation.it: Non sono proprio il padre. Sono più una figura paterna...

translation.en: ...until Social Services can get another family.
translation.it: ...finché l'assistenza sociale non gli trova un'altra famiglia.

translation.en: At which point, you'll find a new way...
...to initiate conversations with girls in the park.
translation.it: ...un altro modo per avvicinare le ragazze al parco.

translation.en: Yeah, that's correct.
Good job, buddy!
He's peeing on his own.
Keep it flowing! That's it!
Go! Go!
So does Corinne's sister have a name?
translation.it: Allora, la sorella di Corinne ha un nome?

translation.en: -It's Layla. -Layla? I like your song.
translation.it: Layla. Layla? Mi piace la tua canzone.

translation.en: Could you do me a favor?
Could you hang out with me?
He'll think he's a failure if he couldn't get me a date.
translation.it: Si crederà un fallito, se non mi rimedia una ragazza.

translation.en: I really can't.
I have a ton of work to do.
translation.it: Ho un sacco di lavoro da fare.

translation.en: I see. Hang on a second.
Come here.
Layla, if you don't come over to Sonny's apartment tonight...
translation.it: Layla, se tu stasera non vieni a casa di Sonny...

translation.en: ...there's a good chance I'll develop a stutter.
translation.it: ...è molto probabile che io mi metta a balbettare.

translation.en: P-P-P-Please don't do this to me.
-That is so cheap. -What?
So I'm working in a tollbooth now.
translation.it: Quindi per ora lavoro in un casello.

translation.en: I originally wanted to be a male model...
translation.it: All'inizio volevo fare il modello ma...

translation.en: ...but I'm not very good-looking, so that didn't work out.
translation.it: ...non sono abbastanza bello e non ha funzionato.

translation.en: I'm sorry to hear that.
I'm all right. I'm recovering.
translation.it: Non è grave. Mi sto riprendendo.

translation.en: This is my favorite part of the song right here.
translation.it: Questa è la mia parte preferita della canzone.

translation.en: Better keep it down low. The kid's gonna wake up. Sonny!
translation.it: Meglio tenere basso il volume sennò si sveglia il bambino.

translation.en: Too late.
Okay. Just hang out a little bit.
I'll be right back. Don't go sneaking out.
translation.it: Torno subito. Non te la svignare.

translation.en: -What are you doing? -You forgot to say good night.
translation.it: - Cosa fai? - Non mi hai dato la buona notte.

translation.en: What do you mean?
I can't go to sleep until you say good night.
translation.it: Non riesco a dormire se non mi dai la buona notte.

translation.en: I didn't know that. I'm sorry. Good night.
translation.it: Non lo sapevo, mi dispiace. Buona notte.

translation.en: Go to sleep now, all right?
What'd we learn about girls?
Initiating the conversation is half the battle.
translation.it: Se inizi una conversazione con una ragazza, sei a metà dell'opera.

translation.en: Bingo. Now sleep, okay?
I gave him NyQuil. He should be out for the night.
translation.it: Gli ho dato delle medicine, dormirà fino a domani.

translation.en: This is Styx. They've been my favorite band since I was 12.
translation.it: Sono gli Styx. Sono il mio gruppo preferito da quando avevo 12 anni.

translation.en: You're kidding me.
No, I can't help it. I just love them.
translation.it: No, è più forte di me, li adoro.

translation.en: My friends make fun of me.
My friends make fun of me too. I've seen them 25 times.
translation.it: Anche a me. Li avrò visti almeno 25 volte.

translation.en: Tommy Shaw, when I was 16, I was at the concert...
translation.it: Tommy Shaw... Avevo 16 anni, ero a un concerto...

translation.en: ...and he reached down, pulled me on stage.
translation.it: ...e lui mi ha preso per mano e mi ha tirato sul palco.

translation.en: -I did the robot voice for "Mr. Roboto." -Really?
translation.it: Ho fatto la voce da robot per "Mr. Roboto". Davvero?

translation.en: No, I made that up. I'm sorry.
That would've been cool, right?
My cousin's friends with their drummer...
...so when they come to town, we go to dinner...
translation.it: ...quindi quando sono in città usciamo a cena...

translation.en: ...and they tell us stories from the road.
translation.it: ...e loro ci raccontano storie del tour.

translation.en: -Really? -No, I made that up again too.
translation.it: - Veramente? - No, ho inventato anche questa.

translation.en: I'm sorry.
You're not attracted to, like, 60-year-old guys, are you?
translation.it: Tu non sei attratta dai sessantenni, per caso, vero?

translation.en: -No. -Yeah, I don't like them either.
translation.it: - No. - Già, non piacciono neanche a me.

translation.en: I can't sleep.
He can't sleep.
So the rabbit ran across the street...
translation.it: E così il coniglio attraversò la strada...

translation.en: ...because he thought he saw some carrots.
translation.it: ...perché credeva di aver visto delle carote.

translation.en: But when he got across the street...
...it turned out they weren't carrots, they were peanuts.
translation.it: ...si accorse che non erano carote ma noccioline.

translation.en: Peanuts?
The peanuts belonged to a squirrel...
translation.it: Le noccioline appartenevano a una scoiattolina...

translation.en: ...who had taken them home from a baseball game.
translation.it: ...che le aveva portate a casa dopo una partita di baseball.

translation.en: And then the rabbit thought to himself...
translation.it: Allora il coniglio pensò tra sé e sé:

translation.en: ..."Carrots, peanuts, what's the difference?"
So he asked the squirrel if he could have some.
translation.it: E domandò alla scoiattolina se poteva averne qualcuna.

translation.en: And the squirrel said, "Of course."
And the rabbit was very happy to make such a nice new friend.
translation.it: E il coniglio era molto contento di aver trovato un'amica così carina.

translation.en: And so was the squirrel.
And the rabbit thought the squirrel had pretty hair.
translation.it: E pensò che la scoiattolina avesse dei bei capelli.

translation.en: And nice eyes also.
And the squirrel thought the rabbit was really nice too.
translation.it: Anche la scoiattolina pensò che il coniglio fosse carino.

translation.en: And then, the rabbit worked up his courage...
translation.it: E poi il coniglio prese il coraggio a due mani...

translation.en: ...and asked the squirrel if he could have...
...just the littlest squirrel kiss.
And the squirrel thought it just wasn't the right time...
translation.it: E la scoiattolina considerò che nella sua vita frenetica...

translation.en: ...in her busy squirrel life to be kissing any rabbits...
translation.it: ...non era il momento più adatto per dare bacini ai conigli...

translation.en: ...even though this particular rabbit was very sweet.
translation.it: ...anche se questo coniglio era molto dolce.

translation.en: And the rabbit got shut down, did he?
translation.it: E così la scoiattolina gli diede buca.

translation.en: That's all right. But he was still thinking maybe...
translation.it: Non fa niente. Ma lui pensava che magari...

translation.en: ...Scuba Steve could get a squirrel kiss...
translation.it: ...Scuba Steve poteva avere un bacio dalla scoiattolina...

translation.en: ...so somebody's getting some action.
Good night, Scuba Steve.
Good night, Frankenstein.
Good night, Sonny.
Good night, Layla.
Don't get caught with any girls.
translation.it: Non farti beccare con le ragazze.

translation.en: It's your first day. Take it slow.
translation.it: È il tuo primo giorno, vacci piano.

translation.en: I'll meet you after school at 2:30, right out front.
translation.it: Ci vediamo dopo la scuola, alle 14:30, proprio lì fuori.

translation.en: You're not staying?
No, I gotta go get you some more ketchup.
translation.it: No, devo andare a prenderti dell'altro ketchup.

translation.en: I don't like these kids.
I don't either, but shouldn't we give them a chance?
translation.it: Neanche a me ma non dovremmo dargli una possibilità?

translation.en: How's this?
Here are the magic sunglasses.
translation.it: Qui ci sono gli occhiali magici.

translation.en: You put them on if you feel scared, okay?
translation.it: Mettiteli se senti di aver paura, va bene?

translation.en: I lost you.
I don't know where you are. I'm sorry.
translation.it: Non so più dove sei. Scusa.

translation.en: Oh, there you go.
You go inside and make some friends.
translation.it: Ora va a conoscere dei nuovi amichetti.

translation.en: Oh, yeah, that's a good hug.
translation.it: Questo sì che è un abbraccio.

translation.en: All right. Go inside. I'm gonna miss you.
Hi, I like your hat.
What's your name?
-Might as well-- -Leave a message!
-Might as well-- -Leave a message!
Mr. Gerrity, this is Arthur Brooks from Social Services. I got good news.
translation.it: Signor Gerrity, sono Arthur Brooks, dell'assistenza sociale. Buone notizie.

translation.en: We may have found a family for Julian.
translation.it: Forse abbiamo trovato una famiglia per Julian.

translation.en: Give me a call back as soon as possible...
...so we can set up a meeting. Bye.
Sierra Club Legal Department.
Can I speak to Layla Maloney?
Layla, line four.
-Hello? -You're a lawyer?
What are you doing?
Waiting for Julian so I can have somebody to play with.
translation.it: Aspetto che Julian esca per giocare con qualcuno.

translation.en: -What are you doing? -I'm swamped.
I gotta do my laundry on my lunch hour.
translation.it: Devo persino fare il bucato nella pausa.

translation.en: I was gonna do my laundry today too. Where are you going?
translation.it: Anch'io devo fare una lavatrice. Tu dove vai?

translation.en: There's a place nearby, Suds, on Bleecker.
translation.it: C'è un posto qui vicino. Suds, sulla Bleecker.

translation.en: I know that place. Maybe I'll see you there then.
translation.it: Conosco il posto. Forse ci vediamo lì.

translation.en: Maybe. I gotta go.
I bought tickets and the show was the night before.
translation.it: Ho comprato i biglietti e il concerto era la sera prima.

translation.en: Maybe it was a mistake.
That's nice, but you don't know what's going down on the streets.
translation.it: Come sei buona, tu non hai idea di quello che succede in giro.

translation.en: It's hard to know what's going down...
...when you're in an office seven days a week, Mr. Tollbooth.
translation.it: ...quando stai in ufficio tutta la settimana, signor Casellante.

translation.en: You're not gonna tell me to get a real job.
translation.it: Non mi dirai di trovarmi un lavoro.

translation.en: No. You're a big boy.
It's cool you only work one day a week.
translation.it: È bello lavorare solo un giorno.

translation.en: These are the cutest things I've ever seen.
translation.it: Sono la cosa più carina che abbia mai visto.

translation.en: I know. I have them in yellow. I wear them when I work out.
translation.it: Lo so. Le ho anche in giallo. Le metto per fare ginnastica.

translation.en: It's great what you're doing with Julian while you got him.
translation.it: È meraviglioso quello che fai con Julian finché rimane con te.

translation.en: Yeah, well, I got him.
I read an article that said...
...the most important influences in a kid's life are his friends.
translation.it: ...che l'influenza più importante per un bimbo sono gli amici.

translation.en: They said that?
Just hope he's not hanging out with drug dealers... ...and delinquents in school.
translation.it: Devi solo sperare che non bazzichino spacciatori e delinquenti a scuola.

translation.en: I'm kidding.
I know. I know.
Man, this Yoo-Hoo is good. You know what else is good?
translation.it: Buono, questo Yoo-hoo. Sai cos'altro è buono?

translation.en: Smoking dope.
I ain't going to rat you out.
Puffing the cheeba.
Go by the seesaw, smoke a J. You know what I'm talking about?
translation.it: Rollarsi uno spino sotto l'altalena. Sai di che parlo?

translation.en: I have a bellybutton.
You have a bellybutton? We all have bellybuttons.
translation.it: Hai un ombelico? Tutti ce l'abbiamo.

translation.en: And we all love Yoo-Hoo. Especially with a little rum.
translation.it: E a tutti piace lo Yoo-hoo. Specialmente con lo sherry.

translation.en: -What's rum? -You don't know?
translation.it: - Cos'è lo sherry? - Non lo sai?

translation.en: Rumpelstiltskin?
Rumpelstiltskin.
Rumpelstiltskin's a good man. So are you guys.
translation.it: Lo sceriffo è una brava persona, e anche voi.

translation.en: Stay clean. Stay focused.
Frankenstein, have fun with your friends.
translation.it: Frankenstein, divertiti con i tuoi amici.

translation.en: Why are you scratching so much?
I have ecza....
Eczema? Gross.
How do I make it stop itching?
I don't know. You scratch it.
Spaghetti-O's. Do you like Spaghetti-O's?
Dented cans are half price.
Microsoft went down three points. We gotta save some money.
translation.it: La Microsoft è scesa di tre punti. Dobbiamo risparmiare.

translation.en: Here, give it a shot.
That's it, boy.
Put it in there. Feels good.
Hi, Sonny. Hi, Sonny's friend.
translation.it: Ciao, Sonny. Ciao, amico di Sonny.

translation.en: His name's Frankenstein.
Hi, Frankenstein. Remember me?
translation.it: Ciao, Frankenstein. Ti ricordi di me?

translation.en: Help me. I'm lost. I don't know where I am.
translation.it: Aiutami, mi sono perso. Non so più dove abito.

translation.en: You don't gotta do that.
You guys wear the same size T-shirt. That's cool.
translation.it: Avete la maglietta della stessa taglia. Che forza.

translation.en: I heard you did laundry with my sister.
translation.it: Com'è che fai il bucato con mia sorella?

translation.en: She said we did laundry?
Where I'm from, it's called doing the hibbity-dibbity.
translation.it: Dalle mie parti si chiama "fare bibidi-bobidi".

translation.en: I got eczema.
Well, then you shouldn't scratch it.
Don't tell him what to do. He can scratch.
translation.it: Non dirgli cosa deve fare. Può grattare, se vuole.

translation.en: -Scratch. -Is that better?
-Thank you. -You're welcome.
You know about kids? I thought you were a foot doctor.
translation.it: Che ne sai di bambini? Credevo fossi un podiatra.

translation.en: It's not doctor stuff. It's common sense. Scratching spreads rashes.
translation.it: Non serve essere medico, è buon senso. Grattarsi estende l'irritazione.

translation.en: This is something you learned at Hooters.
-What the hell is he doing? -He's shopping.
translation.it: - Che diavolo sta facendo? - Fa la spesa.

translation.en: Microsoft went down three points.
translation.it: La Microsoft è scesa di tre punti.

translation.en: That's good. See you later, Frankenstein.
Stay away from the frozen-food section. Your boobs'll harden.
translation.it: Stai alla larga dal reparto surgelati. Ti si induriscono le tette.

translation.en: Isn't Little Italy the greatest?
translation.it: Little Italy non è il massimo?

translation.en: I like it. Everyone always tells me to hang out in the Village and SoHo.
translation.it: A me piace. Mi dicono sempre di andare al Village e a SoHo.

translation.en: That's all right.
But you gotta respect a place where the fatter you are, the cooler you are.
translation.it: Ma è ammirevole un posto dove più grasso sei, meglio sei.

translation.en: Last time, he was with a different girl. I guess he ate her.
translation.it: L'ultima volta stava con una ragazza diversa. Dev'essersela mangiata.

translation.en: I went to Coney Island today with the little boy.
translation.it: Oggi sono andato a Coney Island con il bambino.

translation.en: You gotta take a look at this.
We had a blast together.
He's so happy.
He is such a good boy.
If I have a kid of my own, I hope he's half as cool as that kid.
translation.it: Se mai avrò un figlio mio, spero sia forte almeno la metà di lui.

translation.en: Is he picking your nose?
translation.it: Ha le dita nel tuo naso?

translation.en: Yeah, he was picking his own all day...
translation.it: Beh, le aveva messe nel suo tutto il giorno...

translation.en: -...so I figured he could borrow mine. -Sweet.
translation.it: - ...quindi gli ho prestato il mio. - Che dolce.

translation.en: He must be miserable without you right now.
translation.it: Adesso sarà triste senza di te.

translation.en: No, he's in good hands.
Look at Brad's body. Not an ounce of fat on it.
translation.it: Guarda il corpo di Brad. Non ha un filo di grasso.

translation.en: -What? -Don't worry. I like yours better.
I got two queens, two jacks and an ace.
translation.it: Due regine, due jack e un asso.

translation.en: -I win. -Why do you win?
I got a two, a four, a 10, an eight and a six.
translation.it: Ho un due, un quattro, un dieci un otto e un sei.

translation.en: I don't understand. Why do you win?
-Because I win. -What's the name of that game?
translation.it: - Perché vinco io. - Come si chiama quel gioco?

translation.en: I win.
I'll get it!
-What's up? -I'm looking for Kevin Gerrity.
translation.it: - Cosa c'è? - Sto cercando Kevin Gerrity.

translation.en: He's in China. Who are you?
translation.it: È in Cina. Lei chi è?

translation.en: Arthur Brooks, New York City Social Services. I'm confused.
translation.it: Arthur Brooks, assistenza sociale di New York. Sono un po' confuso.

translation.en: Chinatown. He loves those egg rolls.
translation.it: È a Chinatown. Adora gli involtini primavera.

translation.en: I've tried contacting him several times and he hasn't responded.
translation.it: Ho tentato più volte di contattarlo ma non mi ha mai risposto.

translation.en: I'm concerned.
Ix-nay on the ketchup-nay.
-Have him call me. -All right.
My body's definitely better than his.
translation.it: Il mio corpo è meglio del suo.

translation.en: Without question.
It took you a long time to pencil me in. You work all the time.
translation.it: Ci hai messo un bel po' per inserirmi nel carnet. Lavori continuamente.

translation.en: I know. I'm excited.
You're excited. How long you been this crazy?
translation.it: Elettrizzata. Da quando sei così malata?

translation.en: I guess ever since I was a little girl.
See, my mom got married really young and pretty much just raised us kids.
translation.it: Mia madre si sposò molto giovane e si è sempre e solo occupata di noi.

translation.en: So when my dad took off...
...she wasn't left with a lot of options.
And I think that's when I decided...
translation.it: E fu allora, credo, che decisi...

translation.en: ...that I never wanted to end up in that situation.
translation.it: ...che non volevo mai finire in una situazione del genere.

translation.en: That's actually a good reason to be working.
translation.it: In effetti è un buon motivo per lavorare.

translation.en: I guess I feel like I gotta kick ass while there's ass to be kicked.
translation.it: Perciò penso che devo dare calci in culo finché posso.

translation.en: You kick that ass during the day, but at night you have fun with Sonny.
translation.it: Di giorno dai calci in culo ma di notte te la spassi con Sonny.

translation.en: The best of times
Are when I'm alone with you
translation.it: Sono quelli da solo con te

translation.en: Some rain, some shine
translation.it: Un po' di pioggia, un po' di sole

translation.en: Two guys you were best friends with in law school... ...fell in love with each other?
translation.it: Così due dei tuoi migliori amici della facoltà di legge si sono innamorati?

translation.en: Is that strange for you?
No. Nothing changed, really.
They watch a different kind of porno now. But that's it.
translation.it: Adesso guardano un altro tipo di porno. Tutto qui.

translation.en: My God! This is Corinne's place?
translation.it: Mamma! Questa è casa di Corinne?

translation.en: If the girls at Hooters could see her now.
translation.it: Se le ragazze di Hooters la vedessero ora.

translation.en: -Do you want your ass kicked? -I'm just kidding around, Layla.
translation.it: - Vuoi dei calci in culo? - Sto scherzando, Layla.

translation.en: You're afraid to get involved and you got a lot of work, but...
translation.it: So che hai paura di coinvolgerti e so che hai un mare di lavoro...

translation.en: ...when I'm not with you, I'm thinking of you. Do you have that going on?
translation.it: ...ma quando non sono con te, ti penso sempre. Succede anche a te?

translation.en: Maybe.
Maybe we should try a kiss out.
We owe it to ourselves to see if we should move to the next level.
translation.it: È un dovere verso noi stessi capire se passare allo stadio successivo.

translation.en: I'm not sure.
Me either. It's just that you kissed Scuba Steve.
translation.it: Neanch'io. Solo che hai dato un bacio a Scuba Steve.

translation.en: Ever since then, he's strutted around bragging...
translation.it: Da allora non fa che pavoneggiarsi blaterando:

translation.en: ..."I got a kiss the first night. After three times, you got nothing."
translation.it: "Io ho avuto un bacio la prima sera. Tu, dopo la terza, ancora niente".

translation.en: -He said that? -Come on.
Let's just give it a shot just so I can have some dignity.
translation.it: Proviamoci, così posso riacquistare un po' di dignità.

translation.en: All right?
Oh, my God!
Gross!
Did I witness the first kiss?
Yeah, you did. Thanks a lot for showing up.
translation.it: Già, grazie per essere arrivata in tempo.

translation.en: Layla, you didn't actually enjoy that, did you?
translation.it: Layla, non ti sarà piaciuto, mi auguro!

translation.en: I don't know. I'm going upstairs.
translation.it: Non lo so. Io vado di sopra.

translation.en: Wash your mouth out. He's dirty.
translation.it: Lavati subito la bocca. È sporco.

translation.en: And he's poor.
What do you got in the bag, Corinne? Some chicken wings? Booby tassels?
translation.it: Cos'hai nella busta, Corinne? Tette di pollo? Pennacchi per capezzoli?

translation.en: Shut up.
You have a good sleep.
Pleasant Hooters.
Come on, come on!
This is where we hang our jackets.
translation.it: Qui è dove appendo la giacca.

translation.en: This is my hook.
That's a capertillar.
A caterpillar.
-That's right, a capertillar. -Capertillar, all right.
translation.it: - Esatto, un millepiedri. - Un millepiedri, certo.

translation.en: -Staying clean, pal? -Yes.
You drink the booze, you lose. Remember that, punk.
translation.it: Bevi robaccia, perdi la faccia. Ricordatelo.

translation.en: I'm Julian's teacher, Ms. Foote.
translation.it: Sono la maestra di Julian, la signorina Foote.

translation.en: -You his father? -I'm Kevin Gerrity.
translation.it: - Lei è il padre? - Sono Kevin Gerrity.

translation.en: Do you have some time to go over some things...
translation.it: Ha un po' di tempo per parlare di alcune cose...

translation.en: -...that have been bothering me? -Sure.
Go take a walk, pal.
translation.it: Va' a fare un giro, piccolo.

translation.en: Julian has been displaying some odd behavior.
translation.it: Julian ha manifestato comportamenti piuttosto strani.

translation.en: He spilled glue on the floor and didn't tell anyone.
translation.it: Ha rovesciato della colla per terra e non l'ha detto a nessuno.

translation.en: He covered it with newspaper.
And then one of our students wore Rollerblades for show-and-tell.
translation.it: Poi uno degli allievi aveva messo i pattini, per mostrarli ai compagni.

translation.en: And Julian tripped him with a stick.
translation.it: E Julian lo ha fatto inciampare con un bastone.

translation.en: I've never--
Julian found it hilarious.
I like him to express himself freely.
I've really never seen any problems with that.
translation.it: Non ho mai pensato che fosse un problema.

translation.en: Your boy's making the least progress of any of the children.
translation.it: Suo figlio è quello che ha fatto meno progressi di tutti.

translation.en: Frankly, his personal hygiene is becoming a cause for concern.
translation.it: Francamente, la sua igiene personale sta diventando preoccupante.

translation.en: He's the smelly kid in class? I let him become the smelly kid?
translation.it: È il puzzone della classe? L'ho lasciato diventare quello?

translation.en: What's wrong with me?
I've had some smelly ones before.
But your son is by far the smelliest.
translation.it: Ma suo figlio è il peggiore di tutti.

translation.en: All right, I got you. What do you think I should do?
translation.it: D'accordo, ricevuto. Secondo lei, cosa devo fare?

translation.en: Start by paying more attention to his schoolwork.
translation.it: Cominci facendo più attenzione all'attività scolastica.

translation.en: The class is giving a presentation of the Founding Fathers.
translation.it: La classe darà uno spettacolo sui padri fondatori del paese.

translation.en: Julian has drawn the part of Benjamin Franklin, a very important role.
translation.it: Julian ha la parte di Benjamin Franklin, un ruolo molto importante.

translation.en: Do what you can to help.
I will turn this all around. That's a promise.
translation.it: Va bene, vedrà che cambiamento. Glielo prometto.

translation.en: Thank you very much.
Stinky, let's go. You got us in trouble.
translation.it: Andiamo, puzzola. Ci hai messo nei guai.

translation.en: Did he call him "Stinky"?
Wow, I didn't know this about George Washington.
translation.it: Non la sapevo questa su George Washington.

translation.en: Yes, his teeth were made of wool.
translation.it: Già, aveva tutti i denti tinti.

translation.en: Wood.
I sorry. I mix up "D" and "L."
translation.it: Scusa, ho confuso la "T" e la "F".

translation.en: Well, get it right.
Turn that game off, pal.
I got four guys left.
Let's study a little bit.
I don't wanna study.
Give me that.
-You just killed me. -So what? You'll play later.
translation.it: - Mi hai ucciso. - E allora? Giocherai più tardi.

translation.en: You can't tell me what to do.
Really? Let's take a vote. Who thinks the kid should study?
