translation.it: Davvero? Lo mettiamo ai voti. Chi pensa che devi studiare?

translation.en: Who doesn't? Well, you just lost, two to one.
translation.it: Chi pensa di no? Beh, hai perso. Due contro uno.

translation.en: It's a tie. That guy doesn't count. He can't even read.
translation.it: Siamo pari. Lui non conta, non sa nemmeno leggere.

translation.en: I know. He was just joking around.
Can you hang out here a little bit? I gotta go do something.
translation.it: Senti, puoi stare qui un attimo? Devo fare una cosa.

translation.en: No problem.
Would you like
We'll hop, hop, hop, hop
What do you say?
Get the door.
Hi, Julian. How you doing?
I'm Scuba Sam.
Scuba Steve's father.
You see, my boy...
...needs to take a bath.
The only problem is...
...he's afraid to bathe alone.
translation.it: ...che ha paura a farlo da solo.

translation.en: So I was wondering...
...if maybe you could keep him company in the tub.
translation.it: ...se per caso potevi fargli compagnia nella vasca.

translation.en: Terrific. And after the bath, you have to try and study hard.
translation.it: Magnifico. E dopo il bagno devi studiare sodo.

translation.en: Because if you wanna be a member of the Scuba Squad...
translation.it: Perché se vuoi diventare un membro della squadra Scuba,

translation.en: ...you have to be smart.
I could be in the Scuba Squad?
Well, sure. All you have to do is work hard.
translation.it: Ma certo. Basta solo che ti metti a lavorare sodo.

translation.en: And don't tell a soul about the Scuba Squad...
translation.it: E non dire a nessuno della squadra Scuba...

translation.en: ...because then everybody will wanna join.
And one more thing...
...be nice to the delivery guy, would you?
translation.it: ...sii gentile con il ragazzo delle consegne.

translation.en: It's not his fault he can't read.
translation.it: Non è colpa sua se non sa leggere.

translation.en: Take care.
He told me to watch his boat for him. Said that he wanted to...
translation.it: Mi ha detto di guardargli la barca. Mi ha detto che voleva...

translation.en: ...talk to you about some secret mission.
I have no idea what you're talking about.
translation.it: Non ho assolutamente idea di cosa stai parlando.

translation.en: How come I have to wear a bathing suit?
translation.it: Perché devo mettermi un costume da bagno?

translation.en: I don't know the rules...
...with little kids and grownups and being naked and just sit down.
translation.it: ...per i bambini e gli adulti, stare nudi e siediti e basta.

translation.en: The good news is you're not smelling like a foot anymore.
translation.it: La buona notizia è che non puzzi più di piedi.

translation.en: I read something interesting. You know Benjamin Franklin invented...
translation.it: Ho letto una cosa interessante. Sai che Benjamin Franklin ha inventato...

translation.en: ...bifocals? That's pretty cool.
What are they?
I'll show you in that book. It might help you out with your school play.
translation.it: Te lo mostro sul libro che sto leggendo, ti aiuterà per la recita.

translation.en: We'll make this a regular thing.
Bathing and studying and eating right.
translation.it: Cioè, fare il bagno, studiare e mangiare bene.

translation.en: Put your head back. My grandmother did this to me.
translation.it: Indietro la testa. Mia nonna faceva così.

translation.en: "Oh, boy. When I was a little girl, frankfurters only cost a nickel."
translation.it: "Oh, mamma. Quand'ero una bambina i würstel costavano solo un nichelino".

translation.en: Can you still have fun?
Yeah, but after you study.
In fact, we gotta get you dressing differently.
translation.it: Anzi, dobbiamo anche vestirti in un altro modo.

translation.en: -We'll go to Barney's. -Barney?
Not that Barney. A more expensive Barney.
translation.it: Non il Barney dei cartoni. Un Barney più caro.

translation.en: All right, one at a time.
That's one.
Two.
See? Urinals are good too.
"Electricity."
Very good.
"Constitution."
That's it.
"Philadelphia."
Smart. Good.
"Fish"?
"Hip--"
"Hiphop--"
"Hipopynonamous"?
Damn you! You gave him the easy ones!
translation.it: Maledetto! A lui hai dato quelle più facili.

translation.en: -Thanks! -You're welcome.
Slow down.
-You owe me a Sausage McMuffin. -Okay.
translation.it: Mi devi un McMuffin con salsiccia.

translation.en: There's a pole there.
My name is Alexander Hamilton.
I was the first Secretary of the Treasury.
translation.it: Sono stato il primo Ministro del Tesoro.

translation.en: I owned a bank and a newspaper.
translation.it: Possedevo una banca e un giornale.

translation.en: Aaron Bird shot me.
Hi, my name is Benjamin Franklin.
I was a writer, a diplomat...
translation.it: Sono stato uno scrittore e un diplomatico...

translation.en: ...an inventor and a statesman...
...although I only went to school for two years.
translation.it: ...sebbene sia andato a scuola soltanto per due anni.

translation.en: I wrote many books and invented many things we still use today.
translation.it: Ho scritto molti libri e ho inventato molti oggetti che usiamo ancora oggi.

translation.en: The Declaration of Independence is finished.
Who will be the first to sign?
translation.it: Chi sarà il primo a firmare?

translation.en: -How about you, John Hancock? -I want to sign!
translation.it: - Perché non voi, John Hancock? - Firmo io!

translation.en: -Look at my man stand strong. -He's so cute.
translation.it: - Guarda il mio ometto. - Quant'è carino.

translation.en: What are your cards?
I got a six, a five, a jack, a four and a eight.
translation.it: Ho un sei, un cinque, un jack, un quattro e un otto.

translation.en: -I win. -What do you mean?
I had a hand just like that. I didn't win.
translation.it: Io ho avuto una mano così e non ho vinto.

translation.en: -Because I win. -This is bullshit!
translation.it: Perché vinco io. È una stronzata!

translation.en: All right. Take it easy, man.
Every time it's different cards.
translation.it: Ha carte diverse e vince sempre.

translation.en: So what? Relax. He's a kid.
There should be same set of rules, no matter what age.
translation.it: Le regole dovrebbero essere uguali per tutti.

translation.en: He's gotta learn how to lose too.
-Hello, Mr. Koufax. -Mr. Brooks, how you doing?
translation.it: - Salve, signor Koufax. - Salve, signor Brooks.

translation.en: I was gonna give you a buzz.
You just called me Mr. Koufax, didn't you?
translation.it: Mi ha appena chiamato signor Koufax o sbaglio?

translation.en: It is your name, isn't it? Sonny Koufax?
translation.it: È il suo nome, no? Sonny Koufax.

translation.en: You held yourself out to be Kevin Gerrity...
translation.it: Lei si è spacciato per Kevin Gerrity per ottenere...

translation.en: ...to gain custody of young Julian.
Big problem in this state.
I've delivered to you before.
You always order three pieces of cheesecake.
translation.it: Ordina sempre tre fette di torta alla ricotta.

translation.en: The real Kevin Gerrity asked me to take care of--
translation.it: Il vero Kevin Gerrity mi ha chiesto di occuparmi--

translation.en: Save it, Mr. Koufax.
He has to come with me or I'll arrest you.
translation.it: Il bambino deve venire con me o l'arresto.

translation.en: Take out your handcuffs.
I don't have any, but two policemen downstairs do.
translation.it: Io non le ho ma i due agenti sotto sì.

translation.en: Listen, Sonny, I would like to help...
...but my status in your country is not what you would call legal.
translation.it: ...ma la mia posizione nel vostro paese non è proprio legale.

translation.en: It's okay.
I'm Audi.
Julian, you're gonna have to come with me.
translation.it: Julian, adesso devi venire con me.

translation.en: One second, pal.
Would you just give me a second to say goodbye to the kid?
translation.it: Mi darebbe solo un secondo per salutare il bambino?

translation.en: Take a second.
You don't want me here anymore?
translation.it: Non mi vuoi più qui con te?

translation.en: No, that's not it, pal.
You just gotta go away for a little while.
translation.it: È che devi andare via per un po'.

translation.en: How long am I going away for?
translation.it: E per quanto devo andare via?

translation.en: I don't wanna lie to you.
I don't think we're gonna...
...be seeing each other anymore.
I screwed up, pal. I'm so sorry.
translation.it: Ho fatto un casino, piccolo. Mi dispiace tanto.

translation.en: Come here.
Put your coat on.
It's not your fault, okay? I'm the idiot.
translation.it: Non è colpa tua, capito? Sono io l'idiota.

translation.en: -I don't wanna go. -I know you don't.
But you have to, and you're gonna be okay.
translation.it: Ma devi andare e starai benissimo.

translation.en: Please don't make me go.
translation.it: Ti prego, non farmi andare via.

translation.en: I'm sorry, but I don't know what else to do.
translation.it: Scusami ma non so cos'altro fare.

translation.en: I won't play the kangaroo song anymore.
translation.it: Non metterò più la canzone del canguro.

translation.en: Come on.
Just go. You gotta go.
You gotta go.
I don't wanna go. I promise...
translation.it: Non voglio andare. Te lo prometto...

translation.en: ...I'm sorry. I don't even like that song anymore.
translation.it: ...scusa. Tanto quella canzone non mi piace neanche più.

translation.en: I know, pal. That's not it.
translation.it: Lo so, piccolo. Non è quello.

translation.en: But I wipe my own ass! I wipe my own ass!
translation.it: Ma io mi pulisco il culetto da solo! Me lo pulisco da solo!

translation.en: I know.
-Layla, they took the kid. -Who?
translation.it: - Layla, hanno preso il bambino. - Chi?

translation.en: Social Services. I gotta get him back.
You said this was just temporary.
I can't have it be temporary. It's gotta be permanent.
translation.it: Non può essere temporaneo. Dev'essere permanente.

translation.en: Okay, what can we do?
I filed to get custody based on the child's best interests.
translation.it: Ho chiesto l'affidamento per il bene di Julian.

translation.en: Tommy knew a clerk, so they fast-tracked the hearing. It's Tuesday.
translation.it: Tommy conosceva uno, così hanno anticipato l'udienza. È martedì.

translation.en: -This Tuesday? -You got work?
I gotta go to Washington for a hearing to dismiss my case.
translation.it: Sarò a Washington, c'è l'udienza per archiviare la mia causa.

translation.en: Can you get somebody else?
I'm sorry, Sonny. I can't. It's my case.
translation.it: Mi dispiace, Sonny. Non posso. È una mia causa.

translation.en: We don't even know where this kid's gonna end up.
translation.it: E Julian? Non sapremo nemmeno dove andrà a finire.

translation.en: Sonny, this is exactly why I didn't wanna get involved.
translation.it: Questo è il motivo per cui non volevo lasciarmi coinvolgere.

translation.en: I had things going the way I wanted.
translation.it: La mia vita andava come volevo.

translation.en: Then at the park, you and this kid come barging into my life...
translation.it: Poi un giorno al parco tu e quel bimbo piombate nella mia vita...

translation.en: ...and it's screwing up everything I had planned.
translation.it: ...e stanno andando a puttane tutti i miei piani.

translation.en: You think I planned on a kid showing up on my doorstep?
translation.it: Un bimbo alla mia porta. Credi fosse nei miei piani?

translation.en: But I fell in love with him.
So now my plans have changed.
translation.it: Quindi i miei piani sono cambiati.

translation.en: All rise.
We're here to determine proper custody of Julian McGrath...
translation.it: Siamo qui per stabilire l'affidamento di Julian McGrath...

translation.en: ...also known as Julian Gerrity, a minor child.
translation.it: ...alias Julian Gerrity, un minore orfano di madre.

translation.en: Representing New York City?
translation.it: Per la città di New York?

translation.en: Arthur Brooks, Social Services.
And representing Sonny Koufax?
Plus, I'll pretty much be representing myself.
translation.it: Inoltre mi rappresento più o meno da solo.

translation.en: Anyone else?
Layla Maloney, Your Honor.
-Thank you. -Does this mean that you love me?
translation.it: Questo vuol dire che mi ami?

translation.en: Something like that.
First witness.
Koufax is a good egg. He was nice to that kid.
translation.it: Koufax è un bravo figliolo. Era carino con quel bambino.

translation.en: But he fights like a girl. You like that?
translation.it: Ma picchia come una donnetta. Ti è piaciuto?

translation.en: I'm right here, miss.
What are you gonna do about it?
Are you drunk, Mr. Herlihy?
I had a few chardonnays. What of it?
translation.it: Ho bevuto un paio di chardonnay. Perché?

translation.en: Get off the stand.
You got it.
I've got a few problems.
Off to a good start.
Mr. Koufax is a really cool guy. I wish my dad was as cool as him.
translation.it: Il signor Koufax è un tipo proprio forte. Magari mio padre fosse come lui.

translation.en: My dad was a military man.
Guess I wasn't such a "good soldier."
translation.it: E forse io non sono stato un "bravo soldato".

translation.en: When I was 35, he attempted to give me a crew cut while I was sleeping.
translation.it: Quando avevo 35 anni ha tentato di rasarmi la testa mentre dormivo.

translation.en: I broke his arm, haven't seen him since.
translation.it: Gli ho rotto un braccio e non lo vedo da allora.

translation.en: I'd rather live on the streets than under his rules.
translation.it: Preferisco la strada che vivere sotto le sue regole.

translation.en: Anyway, I think Mr. Koufax should be acquitted of all the charges.
translation.it: Comunque, credo che il signor Koufax dovrebbe essere assolto.

translation.en: If O.J. can get away with murder, why can't Sonny have his kid?
translation.it: Se O.J. può passarla liscia, perché non dare a Sonny il piccolo?

translation.en: This guy knows what I'm talking about.
No more questions.
How long have you delivered food to Mr. Koufax?
translation.it: Da quanto consegna la cena al signor Koufax?

translation.en: I deliver food for six years.
Plus, I'm stripper. But I've put on weight so it's problem.
translation.it: Facciamo a gamba di ferro, ma ora sono un po' ingrassato.

translation.en: I see. And in your experience, was Sonny a good father to Julian?
translation.it: Capisco. E nella sua esperienza, Sonny era un buon padre?

translation.en: Oh, yes. They make terrific pair.
translation.it: Oh, sì. Sono una coppia fantastica.

translation.en: They went together like lamb and tuna fish.
translation.it: Stanno bene insieme come l'agnello con il tonno.

translation.en: Lamb and tuna fish?
Spaghetti and meatball? You more comfortable with that analogy?
translation.it: Preferisce spaghetti con polpette? Preferisce questa analogia?

translation.en: Yes, considering we're in America.
translation.it: Sì, visto che siamo in America.

translation.en: If you don't like spaghetti and meatballs, get out.
translation.it: E se non ti piacciono spaghetti e polpette, vattene.

translation.en: I'll come give you a crew cut.
Let's see your clippers.
Not my problem your dad was sick.
translation.it: Che c'entro io con tuo padre?

translation.en: Stop yelling at me!
Order! Order! Order!
Am I in the right room?
Who the hell are you?
I'm Mr. Koufax's co-counsel.
He has enough co-counsels.
Well...
...one more won't hurt.
Let's get on with it.
Mr. Koufax is simply parading his buddies up there.
translation.it: Il signor Koufax sta solo facendo sfilare i suoi amici.

translation.en: Can't they find someone who isn't a friend?
translation.it: Non possiamo trovare qualcuno che non lo sia?

translation.en: What were Julian and Mr. Koufax doing?
translation.it: Cosa facevano Julian e il signor Koufax?

translation.en: Shopping.
Did he appear to be an attentive, loving father?
translation.it: E le è sembrato un padre attento e amorevole.

translation.en: He certainly did.
And how long have you disliked Mr. Koufax?
translation.it: Da quanto le sta antipatico il signor Koufax?

translation.en: Since the day I met him.
For the record, where did you work during medical school?
translation.it: Per la cronaca, dove lavorava mentre studiava medicina?

translation.en: Hooters.
No further questions.
Asshole.
Next witness.
We'd like to call Julian McGrath.
If it's okay with you, I'd like to ask you a few questions.
translation.it: Se per te va bene, vorrei farti qualche domanda.

translation.en: This is just you and me talking...
translation.it: Siamo solo io e te a parlare...

translation.en: ...so don't pay attention to these people.
translation.it: ...quindi tu non fare caso a loro.

translation.en: Can you tell me how old you are?
Your Honor, one second.
That's better, huh?
Can you tell me how old you are?
translation.it: Ora sai dirmi quanti anni hai?

translation.en: Five.
What's your birthday?
July 15th.
Where were you born?
Toronto.
Toronto? I thought you were from Buffalo.
translation.it: A Toronto? Credevo fossi di Buffalo.

translation.en: I moved to Buffalo with my mommy.
translation.it: Ci siamo trasferiti a Buffalo con la mia mamma.

translation.en: For the past six weeks, you've been living with Sonny?
translation.it: Nelle ultime sei settimane hai vissuto con Sonny, giusto?

translation.en: Yes.
-Did you and Sonny have fun? -Yes.
translation.it: - Tu e Sonny vi siete divertiti? - Sì.

translation.en: What kind of things would you do?
He taught me how to do the sleeper hold like Chief Jay Strongbow.
translation.it: Mi ha insegnato la "presa del dormiglione", come Jay Strongbow.

translation.en: That's nice.
Anything else?
He taught me how to pee on a building.
translation.it: Mi ha insegnato a fare la pipì sui palazzi.

translation.en: Really?
And he taught me that Styx was one of the greatest American rock bands.
translation.it: E mi ha insegnato che gli Styx sono stati uno dei gruppi rock più grandi.

translation.en: They only caught a bad rap...
translation.it: Ma gli hanno tagliato le gambe...

translation.en: ...because most critics are cynical assholes.
translation.it: ...perché quasi tutti i critici sono stronzi e cattivi.

translation.en: I think we'd all agree with that.
Before you came here, do you remember...
translation.it: Prima di venire qui, qual è stata...

translation.en: ...the last thing your mommy said to you?
translation.it: ...l'ultima cosa che ti ha detto la mamma?

translation.en: That she loved me and I was gonna live with my new daddy.
translation.it: Che mi voleva bene e che andavo a stare dal mio nuovo papà.

translation.en: If your mother could pick anyone to be your new daddy...
translation.it: E se lei potesse scegliere chiunque come tuo nuovo papà...

translation.en: ...who would she pick?
Thank you, Julian.
You can step down now.
That went good, don't you think?
I don't know. Judge doesn't look too happy.
translation.it: Non lo so. Il giudice non sembra contento.

translation.en: Mr. Koufax, anyone else?
I'd like to call upon myself, Your Honor.
translation.it: Vorrei chiamare me stesso, vostro onore.

translation.en: Awesome.
Which of your esteemed co-counsels will examine you?
translation.it: Quale dei suoi tanti egregi difensori la interrogherà?

translation.en: My father, Lenny Koufax.
What?
Forget it, Sonny.
What is going on?
Nobody in this world thinks I shouldn't have a child more than that man.
translation.it: Nessuno quanto quell'uomo ritiene che io sia indegno di avere un figlio.

translation.en: He also happens to be a well-respected lawyer in Florida.
translation.it: Ed è anche uno dei più stimati avvocati di tutta la Florida.

translation.en: If I can make a believer out of him, I can make a believer out of everybody.
translation.it: Quindi se riesco a convincere lui, posso convincere tutti.

translation.en: This court is after the truth, not the opinion of the defendant's father.
translation.it: Questa corte cerca la verità, non l'opinione del padre dell'imputato.

translation.en: You want my opinion? My son is a moron.
translation.it: Vuole la mia opinione? Mio figlio è un deficiente.

translation.en: I withdraw my objection. Please proceed.
Mr. Koufax.
This is a big mistake.
I only came today to make sure you didn't end up in jail.
translation.it: Sono venuto solo per far sì che non finissi in galera.

translation.en: That was nice of you. Thank you.
To do what I think is right here.
Cut your fingernails. They're too long.
translation.it: Tagliati le unghie, sono troppo lunghe.

translation.en: Okay, Dad.
This case is simple.
It is absurd to think that Sonny Koufax is ready to raise a child.
translation.it: È assurdo pensare che Sonny Koufax sia pronto a crescere un bambino.

translation.en: -Objection! -Shut up, Tommy.
Sorry, Mr. Koufax.
First of all, how did...
...this sweet little boy, Julian, end up under your supervision?
translation.it: ...è finito questo adorabile bambino, Julian, sotto la tua supervisione?

translation.en: I told Social Services that my name was Kevin Gerrity.
translation.it: Ho detto all'assistente sociale che mi chiamavo Kevin Gerrity.

translation.en: -Of course, you are not Kevin Gerrity. -No.
translation.it: - Ovviamente, non sei Kevin Gerrity. - No.

translation.en: -So you lied. -Yes.
Like the time I found a bag of pot in your drawer...
translation.it: Come quando ho trovato dell'erba nel tuo cassetto...

translation.en: ...and you said you thought they were pencil shavings.
translation.it: ...e mi hai detto che credevi fossero trucioli di matita.

translation.en: Yeah.
Remember when I told you Aunt Fay was coming to New York...
translation.it: E ricordi quando tua zia Fay è venuta a New York...

translation.en: ...and I wanted you to show her the city?
translation.it: ...e volevo che le mostrassi la città?

translation.en: And you said that you had better things to do.
translation.it: E tu hai detto che avevi di meglio da fare.

translation.en: That's right.
I'm curious. Just what were those better things that you had to do?
translation.it: Sono curioso. Cos'era mai questo "meglio" che avevi da fare?

translation.en: Jethro Tull had a reunion concert in New Jersey, so I caught that.
translation.it: I Jethro Tull si erano riuniti per un concerto nel New Jersey.

translation.en: What happened to Aunt Fay that weekend?
translation.it: E cosa è successo alla zia quel weekend?

translation.en: She died.
Yes, she did.
Did you happen to make it to her funeral?
translation.it: Per caso, ci sei andato al funerale?

translation.en: -Why not? -I went to Jones Beach...
translation.it: Perché no? Sono andato a Jones Beach, mi sono ubriacato e addormentato.

translation.en: ...got drunk and fell asleep.
translation.it: Sono andato a Jones Beach, mi sono ubriacato e addormentato.

translation.en: Hell, yes!
Some role model.
Your Honor...
...my son doesn't have health insurance.
He doesn't know how to boil an egg.
translation.it: Non sa cucinare un uovo sodo.

translation.en: He filed for social security at the age of 30.
translation.it: Si è iscritto alla previdenza sociale all'età di 30 anni.

translation.en: He is a drain on the economy, on the country...
translation.it: È un peso per l'economia, per il paese...

translation.en: ...and most of all, on me!
Your Honor, to give this young man...
...custody over another life is not only wrong...
translation.it: ...qualcuno in affidamento, non solo è sbagliato...

translation.en: ...it's insane.
Hey. I love you.
-What? -Don't be scared. It's all right.
translation.it: Cosa? Non aver paura. È tutto a posto.

translation.en: I'm not scared.
If I get custody of Julian, I'll be his father forever.
translation.it: Se ottengo l'affidamento di Julian, sarò suo padre per sempre.

translation.en: That scares you because you think there's a good chance I'll fail.
translation.it: Questo ti spaventa perché pensi che abbia buone probabilità di fallire.

translation.en: Sonny, it's more than a chance. It's a certainty.
translation.it: Sonny, non sono solo probabilità. È una certezza.

translation.en: You're wrong, Dad.
You can be scared that I might get pickpocketed in a bad neighborhood...
translation.it: Puoi aver paura che mi rubino il portafogli in un quartiere malfamato...

translation.en: ...or break my legs skiing.
translation.it: ...o che mi rompa le gambe sciando.

translation.en: But don't be scared about me being a dad, because I will not fail.
translation.it: Ma non temere che non sarò un buon padre, perché non fallirò.

translation.en: I love this kid too much.
I love him as much as you love me, Dad.
translation.it: Gliene voglio tanto quanto tu ne vuoi a me.

translation.en: I'm gonna give him advice and I'm gonna guide him...
translation.it: Gli darò consigli e lo guiderò e sarò presente...

translation.en: ...and I'll be there whenever he needs me.
translation.it: ...ogni volta che avrà bisogno di me.

translation.en: I'll fly to New York to be at his court case...
translation.it: Volerò fino a New York per assistere al suo processo...

translation.en: ...even if I disagree with why he's there.
translation.it: ...anche se non sono d'accordo con lui.

translation.en: But, Sonny, you work in a tollbooth.
translation.it: Ma Sonny, tu lavori in un casello.

translation.en: Don't worry about money.
I am in love with a beautiful girl who makes plenty of it.
translation.it: Sono innamorato di una ragazza che fa soldi a palate.

translation.en: She'll be my sugar mama.
I gotta get me one of those.
I know this is the right thing because I would die for this kid...
translation.it: So che è la cosa giusta perché morirei per questo bambino...

translation.en: ...just so he won't feel one ounce of sadness.
translation.it: ...pur di non fargli provare un grammo di tristezza.

translation.en: That's why you're here right now, to protect me, to be scared for me...
translation.it: Per questo sei qui adesso, per proteggermi, per avere paura per me...

translation.en: ...to be a good father.
And that's exactly what I'm gonna be.
translation.it: Ed è quello che sarò anch'io, papà.

translation.en: Hello, Dad?
Yeah, I just wanted to say I love you.
translation.it: Volevo solo dirti che ti voglio bene.

translation.en: Hi, Mom? Could you put Dad on the phone for a second?
translation.it: Ciao, mamma. Mi passi un attimo papà?

translation.en: Can I borrow that when you're done?
translation.it: Me lo presta quando ha finito?

translation.en: Your Honor...
...my son deserves this kid.
I love you too, sir.
Mr. Koufax...
...the fact is you kidnapped this child.
translation.it: ...il fatto è che lei ha rapito questo bambino.

translation.en: Not only shouldn't you get custody...
...but since you obtained him by defrauding the state...
translation.it: ...ma dato che ha ottenuto il bambino truffando lo stato...

translation.en: ...you should be in jail.
Bailiff, remand him until I can figure out the punishment.
translation.it: Usciere, lo trattenga finché non avrò deciso la condanna.

translation.en: Wait. You can't take him away.
As that boy's father, I refuse to press charges.
translation.it: Come padre del bambino, non sporgo denuncia.

translation.en: Oh, God. Corinne, I'm sorry.
Six years ago, Joe Carter....
Toronto and the Phillies. World Series.
translation.it: Toronto contro i Phillies. Il campionato del mondo.

translation.en: Mitch Williams-- We flew up for the night.
translation.it: E Mitch Williams... Ci siamo andati per la serata.

translation.en: -There was a girl. -Oh, God.
I'm an idiot. I was so hammered.
translation.it: Sono un idiota. Ero completamente ubriaco.

translation.en: Chicken wings, Molson 3-0. Canadian beer is like moonshine.
translation.it: Ali di pollo e Molson 3-0. La birra canadese è fortissima.

translation.en: Hell, yes.
You remember? It was at that Toronto Hooters.
translation.it: Te lo ricordi? Eravamo da Hooters, a Toronto.

translation.en: That was before he met you. That Hooters thing is a coincidence.
translation.it: Era prima che ti conoscesse. La cosa di Hooters è una coincidenza.

translation.en: I'm sorry, Corinne.
I know this changes everything, but I had to do the right thing.
translation.it: Lo so che questo cambia tutto ma dovevo essere onesto.

translation.en: Mr. Castellucci.
Pending a blood test, I....
translation.it: In attesa delle analisi del sangue, io...

translation.en: Whatever.
The court grants custody to Kevin Gerrity, pending the DNA test results.
translation.it: La corte dà l'affidamento a Kevin Gerrity, in attesa del test del DNA.

translation.en: I want you to be my dad, Sonny.
translation.it: Voglio che tu sia il mio papà, Sonny.

translation.en: I know. I do too, pal.
But I'm not sure that can happen exactly the way we want it.
translation.it: Ma non sono sicuro che possa andare esattamente come vogliamo.

translation.en: Because it seems you already have a daddy.
translation.it: Perché a quanto pare un papà tu già ce l'hai.

translation.en: But I'll tell you what I can do.
translation.it: Ma ti dico cosa possiamo fare.

translation.en: I can be your friend, no matter what. All right?
translation.it: Posso essere tuo amico. Va bene?

translation.en: I'll always be your friend.
I'll always be your family. I'll always be around.
translation.it: Sarò sempre uno di famiglia. Ti sarò sempre vicino.

translation.en: I promise.
The kid's good at tying his shoes.
translation.it: È bravino ad allacciarsi le scarpe.

translation.en: He's not great at it, so work with him.
-I'll teach him bunny ears. -What's bunny ears?
translation.it: - Gli insegno "le orecchie di coniglio". - E com'è?

translation.en: Make bunny ears, cross and pull them through.
translation.it: Si fanno le orecchie, si incrociano e si tira.

translation.en: I go with this loop, swoop and pull thing. He likes that.
translation.it: Io uso "giri, rigiri e tiri". Gli piace.

translation.en: -I don't know that. -Go with the loop, swoop and pull.
translation.it: - Non lo conosco. - Vai col "giri, rigiri e tiri".

translation.en: I swear to God it's working.
All right.
Go with the bunny ears thing. You're his dad, right? I'm sorry.
translation.it: Vai con "le orecchie di coniglio". Sei suo padre, no? Scusami.

translation.en: It's important, when you eat at my restaurant...
translation.it: È importante. Quando mangi al mio ristorante...

translation.en: ...you never order BLT.
translation.it: ...non ordinare mai il panino alla pancetta.

translation.en: You must trust me. Stay away from BLT, okay?
translation.it: Fidati. Stai alla larga dal panino alla pancetta.

translation.en: Hey, guys.
I'm gonna leave you with your dad now, Julian.
translation.it: Adesso ti lascio con il tuo papà, Julian.

translation.en: He's a good man. I've known him my whole life.
translation.it: È un bravo ragazzo. Lo conosco da tutta la vita.

translation.en: So you two have fun and I'll see you in the morning.
translation.it: Perciò divertitevi e ci vediamo domattina.

translation.en: All right?
-Quit scaring the kid for a minute. -Who am I scaring?
translation.it: - E piantala di spaventarlo. - Chi sto spaventando?

translation.en: Bye, pal.
I went to China. Do you know where that is?
translation.it: Io ero in Cina. Sai dov'è?

translation.en: It's in Asia, which is...
...by Europe. I brought some cool stuff back.
translation.it: ...vicino all'Europa. Ho portato delle cose forti.

translation.en: Did you move the bench?
That's pretty funny.
You know what I got? Some noisemakers. Check this out.
translation.it: Sai cosa ho portato? Questi pop-pop. Guarda qua.

translation.en: Wanna try one?
That's my foot!
You're nice man.
I've got Spice Channel. It's blurry but it's nice.
translation.it: Da me si prende il canale porno. Si vede male ma...

translation.en: Let's make this quick. I gotta get to work.
translation.it: Facciamo presto, voglio tornare al lavoro.

translation.en: Holy shit. Sonny Koufax would rather work than eat.
translation.it: Porca miseria. Sonny Koufax preferisce il lavoro al cibo.

translation.en: I'm working on a big case. I gotta sue you for making me come here.
translation.it: Lavoro su un caso grosso. Dovrei farvi causa per avermi trascinato qui.

translation.en: Surprise!
Did you just waste the good surprise on me again?
translation.it: Avete sprecato di nuovo la sorpresa con me?

translation.en: Hi, Corinne.
-Happy birthday. -Thanks, everybody.
Hey, you guys. How are you?
Happy birthday, Daddy.
How you doing, cutie?
Sonny, I beat you so bad in basketball yesterday.
translation.it: Sonny, ti ho massacrato di brutto ieri a basket.

translation.en: From now on, I have to stop letting you win.
translation.it: D'ora in poi non ti lascerò più vincere.

translation.en: I stopped that months ago. He still wins.
translation.it: Io ho smesso ma lui mi batte.

translation.en: That's because you suck.
Corinne, put a tank top on for old time's sake.
translation.it: Mettiti una canottierina come ai vecchi tempi.

translation.en: -What is he talking about, Mommy? -Nothing.
translation.it: - Di cosa sta parlando, mamma? - Niente.

translation.en: -Happy birthday, Sonny. -Thank you.
It's a clock radio.
-Thanks for telling me. -I have to split.
translation.it: - Grazie di avermelo detto. - Devo scappare.

translation.en: I got deliveries.
Hang out with us. We'll have fun.
No, I can't stay. I'll hang for a little bit.
translation.it: No, non posso rimanere. Magari solo un minuto.

translation.en: There you go. Come on, let's eat, everybody.
Hey, you! Still missing that tooth, huh?
translation.it: Ehi, tu! Ti manca ancora il dentino?

translation.en: Can we get some fries?
-Vanessa. -Hi, Sonny.
You're a Hooters girl?
What happened to Sid's five-year plan?
translation.it: E il piano quinquennale di Sid?

translation.en: How you doing?
-Maybe it's a 10-year plan. -Is that the guy with the old balls?
translation.it: - Forse era un piano decennale. - È il signore dalle palle avvizzite?

translation.en: I think it is.
Come on. I bet they're nice.
translation.it: E dai. Scommetto che sono normali.

translation.en: You're not supposed to say "balls." Testicles. Okay?
translation.it: Ma non si dice "palle". Si dice testicoli.
